95// Kind of hacky, but we need to dance on the guts of the terrain.
96extern void oversizeTheTerrain(Int amount);
97
98//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
99//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100// when you set controlling player or merge teams, we don't always update all the upgrade stuff
101// or the indicator color. this allows us to force the situation. (srj)
102static void updateTeamAndPlayerStuff( Object *obj, void *userData )
103{
104 if (obj)
105 {
106 obj->updateUpgradeModules();
107
108 // srj sez: apparently we have to do this too, since Team::setControllingPlayer
109 // does not. Might make more sense to do it there, but am scared to at this point.
110 Drawable* draw = obj->getDrawable();
111 if (draw)
112 {
113 if (TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT)
114 draw->setIndicatorColor(obj->getNightIndicatorColor());
115 else
116 draw->setIndicatorColor(obj->getIndicatorColor());
117 }
118 }
119}

121//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

123// STATICS ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
124
125// DEFINES ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
126#define REALLY_FAR (100000 * MAP_XY_FACTOR)
127
128// GLOBALS ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
129ScriptActionsInterface *TheScriptActions = NULL;
130GameWindow *ScriptActions::m_messageWindow = NULL;
131
132//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
133//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
134ScriptActions::ScriptActions()
135{
136 m_suppressNewWindows = FALSE;
137 m_unnamedUnit = AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
138
139} // end ScriptActions
140
141//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
142//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
143ScriptActions::~ScriptActions()
144{
145 reset(); // just in case.
146} // end ~ScriptActions
147
148//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
150//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
151void ScriptActions::init( void )
152{
153
154 reset();
155
156} // end init
157
158//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
161void ScriptActions::reset( void )
162{
163 m_suppressNewWindows = FALSE;
164 closeWindows(FALSE); // Close victory or defeat windows.
165
166} // end reset
167
168//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
170//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
171void ScriptActions::update( void )
172{
173 // Empty for now. jba.
174} // end update
175
176
177//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
179//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
180void ScriptActions::closeWindows( Bool suppressNewWindows )
181{
182 m_suppressNewWindows = suppressNewWindows;
183
184 if (m_messageWindow) {
185 TheWindowManager->winDestroy(m_messageWindow);
186 m_messageWindow = NULL;
187 }
188}
189
190//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
192//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
193void ScriptActions::doQuickVictory( void )
194{
195 closeWindows(FALSE);
196 TheGameLogic->closeWindows();
197 doDisableInput();
198 if(TheCampaignManager)
199 TheCampaignManager->SetVictorious(TRUE);
200 TheScriptEngine->startQuickEndGameTimer();
201}
202
203//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
205//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
206void ScriptActions::doSetInfantryLightingOverride(Real setting)
207{
208 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( (setting == -1.0f) || (setting > 0.0f), ("Invalid setting (%d) in Infantry Lighting Override script.", setting) );
209 TheWritableGlobalData->m_scriptOverrideInfantryLightScale = setting;
210}
211
212//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
214//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
215void ScriptActions::doVictory( void )
216{
217 closeWindows(FALSE);
218 TheGameLogic->closeWindows();
219 doDisableInput();
220 if (!m_suppressNewWindows)
221 {
222 const Player *localPlayer = ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer();
223 Bool showObserverWindow = localPlayer->isPlayerObserver() || TheScriptEngine->hasShownMPLocalDefeatWindow();
224 if(showObserverWindow)
225 m_messageWindow = TheWindowManager->winCreateFromScript("Menus/ObserverQuit.wnd");
226 else
227 {
228 m_messageWindow = TheWindowManager->winCreateFromScript("Menus/Victorious.wnd");
229 }
230 }
231 if(TheCampaignManager)
232 TheCampaignManager->SetVictorious(TRUE);
233 TheScriptEngine->startEndGameTimer();
234}
235
236//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
238//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
239void ScriptActions::doDefeat( void )
240{
241 closeWindows(FALSE);
242 TheGameLogic->closeWindows();
243 doDisableInput();
244 if (!m_suppressNewWindows)
245 {
246 const Player *localPlayer = ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer();
247 Bool showObserverWindow = localPlayer->isPlayerObserver() || TheScriptEngine->hasShownMPLocalDefeatWindow();
248 if(showObserverWindow)
249 m_messageWindow = TheWindowManager->winCreateFromScript("Menus/ObserverQuit.wnd");
250 else
251 {
252 m_messageWindow = TheWindowManager->winCreateFromScript("Menus/Defeat.wnd");
253 }
254 }
255 if(TheCampaignManager)
256 TheCampaignManager->SetVictorious(FALSE);
257 TheScriptEngine->startEndGameTimer();
258}
259
260//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
262//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
263void ScriptActions::doLocalDefeat( void )
264{
265 TheScriptEngine->markMPLocalDefeatWindowShown();
266 closeWindows(FALSE);
267 TheGameLogic->closeWindows();
268 if (!m_suppressNewWindows)
269 {
270 if(!TheVictoryConditions->amIObserver())
271 m_messageWindow = TheWindowManager->winCreateFromScript("Menus/LocalDefeat.wnd");
272 }
273 if(TheCampaignManager)
274 TheCampaignManager->SetVictorious(FALSE);
275 TheScriptEngine->startCloseWindowTimer();
276}
277
278//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
280//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
281void ScriptActions::changeObjectPanelFlagForSingleObject(Object *obj, const AsciiString& flagToChange, Bool newVal )
282{
283 // Enabled flag
284 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[0])
285 {
286 obj->setScriptStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_DISABLED, !newVal);
287 return;
288 }
289
290 // Powered flag
291 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[1])
292 {
293 obj->setScriptStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNPOWERED, !newVal);
294 return;
295 }
296
297 // Indestructible flag
298 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[2])
299 {
300 BodyModuleInterface* body = obj->getBodyModule();
301 if (body) {
302 body->setIndestructible(newVal);
303 }
304 return;
305 }
306
307 // Unsellable flag
308 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[3])
309 {
310 obj->setScriptStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNSELLABLE, newVal);
311 return;
312 }
313
314 // Selectable flag
315 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[4])
316 {
317 if (obj->isSelectable() != newVal) {
318 obj->setSelectable(newVal);
319 }
320 return;
321 }
322
323 // AI Recruitable flag
324 if (flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[5])
325 {
326 if (obj->getAIUpdateInterface()) {
327 obj->getAIUpdateInterface()->setIsRecruitable(newVal);
328 }
329
330 return;
331 }
332
333 // Player targetable flag
334 if( flagToChange == TheObjectFlagsNames[6] )
335 {
336 obj->setScriptStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_TARGETABLE, newVal );
337 return;
338 }
339
340}
341
342//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
344//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
345void ScriptActions::doDebugMessage(const AsciiString& msg, Bool pause )
346{
347 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, pause);
348}
349
350//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
352//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
353void ScriptActions::doPlaySoundEffect(const AsciiString& sound)
354{
355 AudioEventRTS audioEvent(sound);
356 audioEvent.setIsLogicalAudio(true);
357 audioEvent.setPlayerIndex(ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer()->getPlayerIndex());
358 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &audioEvent );
359}
360
361
362//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
364//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
365void ScriptActions::doPlaySoundEffectAt(const AsciiString& sound, const AsciiString& waypoint)
366{
367 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
368 if (!way) {
369 return;
370 }
371
372 AudioEventRTS audioEvent(sound, way->getLocation());
373 audioEvent.setIsLogicalAudio(true);
374 audioEvent.setPlayerIndex(ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer()->getPlayerIndex());
375 TheAudio->addAudioEvent( &audioEvent );
376}
377
378//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
380//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
381void ScriptActions::doEnableObjectSound(const AsciiString& objectName, Bool enable )
382{
383 Object *object = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(objectName);
384 if (!object)
385 {
386 return;
387 }
388
389 Drawable *drawable = object->getDrawable();
390 if ( !drawable )
391 {
392 return;
393 }
394
395 drawable->enableAmbientSoundFromScript( enable );
396}
397
398
399//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
401//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
402void ScriptActions::doDamageTeamMembers(const AsciiString& team, Real amount)
403{
404 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
405 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
406 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
407 if (theTeam) {
408 theTeam->damageTeamMembers(amount);
409 }
410}
411
412//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
414//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
415void ScriptActions::doMoveToWaypoint(const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& waypoint)
416{
417 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
418
419 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
420 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
421 if (theTeam) {
422 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
423 if (!theGroup) {
424 return;
425 }
426
427 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
428 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
429 if (way) {
430 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
431 //DEBUG_LOG(("Moving team to waypoint %f, %f, %f\n", destination.x, destination.y, destination.z));
432 theGroup->groupMoveToPosition( &destination, false, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
433 }
434 }
435}
436
437//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
439//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
440void ScriptActions::doNamedMoveToWaypoint(const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& waypoint)
441{
442 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
443 if (theObj)
444 {
445 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
446 if (!way) {
447 return;
448 }
449
450 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
451
452 AIUpdateInterface *aiUpdate = theObj->getAIUpdateInterface();
453 if (!aiUpdate) {
454 return;
455 }
456
457 aiUpdate->clearWaypointQueue();
458 theObj->leaveGroup();
459 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
460 aiUpdate->aiMoveToPosition( &destination, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
461
462 }
463}
464
465//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
467//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
468void ScriptActions::doCameraFollowNamed(const AsciiString& unit, Bool snapToUnit)
469{
470 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
471 if (theObj)
472 {
473 TheTacticalView->setCameraLock(theObj->getID());
474 if (snapToUnit)
475 TheTacticalView->snapToCameraLock();
476
477 TheTacticalView->setSnapMode( View::LOCK_FOLLOW, 0.0f );
478 }
479}
480
481//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
483//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
484void ScriptActions::doStopCameraFollowUnit(void)
485{
486 TheTacticalView->setCameraLock(INVALID_ID);
487}
488
489//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
491//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
492void ScriptActions::doSetTeamState(const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& state)
493{
494 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
495 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
496 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
497 if (theTeam) {
498 theTeam->setState(state);
499 }
500}
501
503//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
504void ScriptActions::doCreateReinforcements(const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& waypoint)
505{
506 TeamPrototype *theTeamProto = TheTeamFactory->findTeamPrototype( team );
507 Coord3D destination;
508
509
510 Bool needToMoveToDestination = false;
511 //Validate the waypoint
512 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
513 if (way==NULL)
514 {
515 return;
516 }
517
518 destination = *way->getLocation();
519 if (!theTeamProto) {
520 DEBUG_LOG(("***WARNING - Team %s not found.\n", team));
521 return;
522 }
523 const TeamTemplateInfo *pInfo = theTeamProto->getTemplateInfo();
524 Coord3D origin = destination;
525 way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(pInfo->m_startReinforceWaypoint);
526 if (way) {
527 origin = *way->getLocation();
528 if (origin.x != destination.x || origin.y != destination.y) {
529 needToMoveToDestination = true;
530 }
531 }
532
533 //Create the team (not the units inside team).
534 Team *theTeam = TheTeamFactory->createInactiveTeam( team );
535 if (theTeam==NULL) {
536 return;
537 }
538 const ThingTemplate *transportTemplate;
539 const ThingTemplate *unitTemplate;
540
541 //Create the transport first (if applicable), so we can determine if it has paradrop capabilities.
542 //If so, we'll be doing a lot of things differently!
543 Object *transport=NULL;
544 ContainModuleInterface *contain = NULL;
545 transportTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( pInfo->m_transportUnitType );
546 if( transportTemplate )
547 {
548 transport = TheThingFactory->newObject( transportTemplate, theTeam );
549 transport->setPosition( &origin );
550 transport->setOrientation( 0.0f );
551 if( transport )
552 {
553 contain = transport->getContain();
554 }
555 }
556 Int transportCount = 1;
557
558 //Check to see if we have a transport, and if our transport has paradrop capabilities. If this is the
559 //case, we'll need to create each unit inside "parachute containers".
560 static NameKeyType key_DeliverPayloadAIUpdate = NAMEKEY("DeliverPayloadAIUpdate");
561 DeliverPayloadAIUpdate *dp = NULL;
562 if( transport )
563 {
564 dp = (DeliverPayloadAIUpdate*)transport->findUpdateModule(key_DeliverPayloadAIUpdate);
565 }
566
567 //Our tranport has a deliverPayload update module. This means it'll do airborned drops.
568
569 const ThingTemplate* putInContainerTemplate = NULL;
570 if( dp )
571 {
572 //Check to see if we are packaging our units
573 putInContainerTemplate = dp->getPutInContainerTemplateViaModuleData();
574 }
575
576 //Now create the units that make up the team.
577 Int i, j;
578 for (i=0; i<pInfo->m_numUnitsInfo; i++)
579 {
580 // get thing template based from map object name
581 unitTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(pInfo->m_unitsInfo[i].unitThingName);
582 Coord3D pos = origin;
583 if (unitTemplate && theTeam)
584 {
585 Object *obj = NULL;
586 for (j=0; j<pInfo->m_unitsInfo[i].maxUnits; j++)
587 {
588 // create new object in the world
589 obj = TheThingFactory->newObject( unitTemplate, theTeam );
590 if( obj )
591 {
593 pos.x = origin.x + 2.25*(j)*obj->getGeometryInfo().getMajorRadius();
594 pos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight(pos.x, pos.y);
595 obj->setPosition( &pos );
596 obj->setOrientation(0.0f);
597
598
599 } // end if
600 }
601 if (obj) pos.y += 2*obj->getGeometryInfo().getMajorRadius();
602 }
603 origin.y = pos.y;
604 }
605 origin = destination;
606 if (pInfo->m_teamStartsFull)
607 {
608 // Have them load into transports in the team.
609 EntriesVec vecOfUnits;
610 SpacesVec vecOfTransports;
611
612 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
613 {
614 Object *obj = iter.cur();
615 if (!obj) {
616 continue;
617 }
618 if (obj==transport) {
619 continue; // Skip the one we created. The team loads into the transports on the team for team starts full. jba
620 }
621 if (obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_TRANSPORT))
622 {
623 ContainModuleInterface *contain = obj->getContain();
624 if( contain )
625 {
626 vecOfTransports.push_back(std::make_pair(obj->getID(), ((TransportContain*)contain)->getContainMax()));
627 }
628 else
629 {
630 DEBUG_CRASH( ("doCreateReinforcement script -- transport doesn't have contain to hold guys.") );
631 }
632 }
633 else
634 {
635 Int slots = obj->getTransportSlotCount();
636 if (slots==0) slots = 0x7fffff; // 0 means lots.
637 vecOfUnits.push_back(std::make_pair(obj->getID(), slots));
638 }
639 }
640
641 // we've now built the necessary stuff. Partition the units.
642
643 PartitionSolver partition(vecOfUnits, vecOfTransports, PREFER_FAST_SOLUTION);
644 partition.solve();
645 SolutionVec solution = partition.getSolution();
646 for (int i = 0; i < solution.size(); ++i) {
647 Object *unit = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(solution[i].first);
648 Object *trans = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(solution[i].second);
649 if (!unit || !trans) {
650 continue;
651 }
652 ContainModuleInterface *contain = trans->getContain();
653 if (contain)
654 {
655 contain->addToContain(unit);
656 }
657 }
658
659 }
660 contain = NULL;
661 if( transport )
662 {
663 contain = transport->getContain();
664 }
665 if (contain)
666 {
667 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
668 {
669 Object *obj = iter.cur();
670 if (!obj)
671 {
672 continue;
673 }
674 if (obj->getTemplate()->isEquivalentTo(transport->getTemplate()) )
675 {
676 // it's our transport.
677 continue;
678 }
679 if (obj->getContainedBy() != NULL)
680 {
681 continue;
682 }
683 //Check to see if it's a valid transport for this unit, even if it's full.
684
685 Coord3D pos = origin;
686 pos.x += transportCount*transport->getGeometryInfo().getMajorRadius();
687 pos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight(pos.x, pos.y);
688
689 if (contain && contain->isValidContainerFor(obj, false))
690 {
691 //Now that we know it fits in the transport, check to see if it's full. If it is,
692 //then we'll create a new transport.
693 if (!contain->isValidContainerFor(obj, true))
694 {
695 // full, try building another.
696 transport = TheThingFactory->newObject( transportTemplate, theTeam );
697 transport->setPosition( &pos );
698 transportCount++;
699 transport->setOrientation(0.0f);
700 if (transport)
701 {
702 contain = transport->getContain();
703 }
704 }
705 //If our unit is going to be put in another container (such as infantry being contained by a parachute)
706 //do so now.
707 if( putInContainerTemplate )
708 {
709 Object* container = TheThingFactory->newObject( putInContainerTemplate, theTeam );
710 container->setPosition( &pos );
711
712 //Make sure this is valid.
713 if( container->getContain() && container->getContain()->isValidContainerFor( obj, true ) )
714 {
715 container->getContain()->addToContain( obj );
716 obj = container;
717 }
718 else
719 {
720 DEBUG_CRASH( ("doCreateReinforcements: PutInContainer %s is full, or not valid for the payload %s!", putInContainerTemplate->getName().str(), obj->getTemplate()->getName().str() ) );
721 }
722 }
723
724 //Add our unit to the transport.
725 contain->addToContain( obj );
726 }
727 }
728 }
729
730
731 if (theTeam)
732 {
733 if (transport)
734 {
735 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
736 {
737 Object *obj = iter.cur();
738 if (!obj)
739 {
740 continue;
741 }
742 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
743 if (obj->getTemplate()->isEquivalentTo(transport->getTemplate()) )
744 {
745 if( dp )
746 {
747 dp->deliverPayloadViaModuleData( &destination );
748 }
749 // it's our transport.
750 else if( pInfo->m_transportsExit )
751 {
752 if( ai )
753 {
754 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
755 ai->aiMoveToAndEvacuateAndExit(&destination, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
756 }
757 }
758 else
759 {
760 if( ai )
761 {
762 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
763 ai->aiMoveToAndEvacuate( &destination, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
764 }
765 }
766 }
767 else
768 {
769 // If there are any units that aren't transportable, move them to the goal.
770 if( !obj->isDisabledByType( DISABLED_HELD ) )
771 {
772 if( ai )
773 {
774 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
775 ai->aiMoveToPosition(&destination, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
776 }
777 }
778 }
779 }
780 }
781 else
782 {
783 theTeam->setActive();
784 if (needToMoveToDestination)
785 {
786 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
787 if (!theGroup)
788 {
789 return;
790 }
791 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
792 theGroup->groupMoveToPosition( &destination, false, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
793 }
794 }
795 }
796}
797
798//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
800//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
801void ScriptActions::doMoveCameraTo(const AsciiString& waypoint, Real sec, Real cameraStutterSec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
802{
803 for (Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getFirstWaypoint(); way; way = way->getNext()) {
804 if (way->getName() == waypoint) {
805 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
806 TheTacticalView->moveCameraTo(&destination, sec*1000, cameraStutterSec*1000, true, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
807 break;
808 }
809 }
810}
811
812//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
814//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
815void ScriptActions::doZoomCamera(Real zoom, Real sec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
816{
817 TheTacticalView->zoomCamera(zoom, sec*1000.0f, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
818}
819
820//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
822//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
823void ScriptActions::doPitchCamera(Real pitch, Real sec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
824{
825 TheTacticalView->pitchCamera(pitch, sec*1000.0f, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
826}
827
828//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
830//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
831void ScriptActions::doOversizeTheTerrain(Int amount)
832{
833 oversizeTheTerrain(amount);
834 Coord2D offset;
835 offset.x = 0.0001f;
836 offset.y = 0.0001f;
837 TheTacticalView->scrollBy(&offset);
838 offset.x = -0.0001f;
839 offset.y = -0.0001f;
840 TheTacticalView->scrollBy(&offset);
841}
842
843//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
845//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
846void ScriptActions::doSetupCamera(const AsciiString& waypoint, Real zoom, Real pitch, const AsciiString& lookAtWaypoint)
847{
848 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
849 if (way==NULL) return;
850 Coord3D pos = *way->getLocation();
851 Waypoint *lookat = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(lookAtWaypoint);
852 if (lookat==NULL) return;
853 Coord3D destination = *lookat->getLocation();
854 TheTacticalView->moveCameraTo(&pos, 0, 0, true, 0.0f, 0.0f);
855 TheTacticalView->cameraModLookToward(&destination);
856 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalPitch(pitch, 0.0f, 0.0f);
857 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalZoom(zoom, 0.0f, 0.0f);
858}
859
860//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
862//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
863void ScriptActions::doModCameraLookToward(const AsciiString& waypoint)
864{
865 for (Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getFirstWaypoint(); way; way = way->getNext()) {
866 if (way->getName() == waypoint) {
867 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
868 TheTacticalView->cameraModLookToward(&destination);
869 break;
870 }
871 }
872}
873
874//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
876//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
877void ScriptActions::doModCameraFinalLookToward(const AsciiString& waypoint)
878{
879 for (Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getFirstWaypoint(); way; way = way->getNext()) {
880 if (way->getName() == waypoint) {
881 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
882 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalLookToward(&destination);
883 break;
884 }
885 }
886}
887
888//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
890//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
891void ScriptActions::doModCameraMoveToSelection(void)
892{
893 Int count=0;
894 Coord3D destination;
895 destination.x=destination.y=destination.z = 0;
896
897 for (Drawable *d = TheGameClient->firstDrawable(); d; d = d->getNextDrawable())
898 {
899 if (d->isSelected())
900 {
901 Coord3D pos = *d->getPosition();
902 destination.x += pos.x;
903 destination.y += pos.y;
904 destination.z += pos.z;
905 count++;
906 }
907 }
908 if (count) {
909 destination.z /= count;
910 destination.x /= count;
911 destination.y /= count;
912 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalMoveTo(&destination);
913 }
914
915}
916
917//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
919//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
920void ScriptActions::doResetCamera(const AsciiString& waypoint, Real sec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
921{
922 for (Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getFirstWaypoint(); way; way = way->getNext()) {
923 if (way->getName() == waypoint) {
924 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
925 TheTacticalView->resetCamera(&destination, sec*1000, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
926 break;
927 }
928 }
929}
930
931//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
933//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
934void ScriptActions::doRotateCamera(Real rotations, Real sec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
935{
936 TheTacticalView->rotateCamera(rotations, sec*1000.0f, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
937}
938
939//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
941//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
942void ScriptActions::doRotateCameraTowardObject(const AsciiString& unitName, Real sec, Real holdSec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
943{
944 const Object *unit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
945 if (!unit)
946 return;
947 TheTacticalView->rotateCameraTowardObject(unit->getID(), sec*1000.0f, holdSec*1000.0f, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
948}
949
950//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
952//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
953void ScriptActions::doRotateCameraTowardWaypoint(const AsciiString& waypointName, Real sec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut, Bool reverseRotation)
954{
955 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
956 if (way==NULL) return;
957 TheTacticalView->rotateCameraTowardPosition(way->getLocation(), sec*1000.0f, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f, reverseRotation);
958}
959
960//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
962//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
963void ScriptActions::doMoveCameraAlongWaypointPath(const AsciiString& waypoint, Real sec, Real cameraStutterSec, Real easeIn, Real easeOut)
964{
965 for (Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getFirstWaypoint(); way; way = way->getNext()) {
966 if (way->getName() == waypoint) {
967 TheTacticalView->moveCameraAlongWaypointPath(way, sec*1000, cameraStutterSec*1000, true, easeIn*1000.0f, easeOut*1000.0f);
968 break;
969 }
970 }
971}
972
973//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
975//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
976void ScriptActions::doCreateObject(const AsciiString& objectName, const AsciiString& thingName, const AsciiString& teamName, Coord3D *pos, Real angle )
977{
978 Object* pOldObj = NULL;
979
980 if (objectName != m_unnamedUnit) {
981 pOldObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(objectName);
982
983 if (pOldObj && !pOldObj->isEffectivelyDead()) {
984 AsciiString str = "WARNING - Object with name ";
985 str.concat(objectName);
986 str.concat(" already exists. Failed Create.");
987 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(str, false);
988 // Unit by that name already exists
989 return;
990 }
991 }
992
993 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
994 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
995 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
996 if (theTeam==NULL) {
997 // We may need to create the team.
998 theTeam = TheTeamFactory->createTeam( teamName );
999 }
1000 if (!theTeam) {
1001 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage("***WARNING - Team not found:***", false);
1002 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, true);
1003 DEBUG_LOG(("WARNING - Team %s not found.\n", teamName.str()));
1004 return;
1005 }
1006 const ThingTemplate *thingTemplate;
1007 // get thing template based from map object name
1008 thingTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(thingName);
1009 if (thingTemplate) {
1010 // create new object in the world
1011 Object *obj = TheThingFactory->newObject( thingTemplate, theTeam );
1012 if( obj )
1013 {
1014 if (objectName != m_unnamedUnit) {
1015 obj->setName(objectName);
1016 if (pOldObj || TheScriptEngine->didUnitExist(objectName)) {
1017 TheScriptEngine->transferObjectName(objectName, obj);
1018 } else {
1019 TheScriptEngine->addObjectToCache(obj);
1020 }
1021 }
1022
1023 obj->setOrientation(angle);
1024 obj->setPosition( pos );
1025
1026 if ( obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_BLAST_CRATER ) ) // since these footprints are permanent
1027 {
1028 TheTerrainLogic->createCraterInTerrain( obj );
1029 TheAI->pathfinder()->addObjectToPathfindMap( obj );
1030 }
1031
1032
1033 } // end if
1034 } else {
1035 DEBUG_LOG(("WARNING - ThingTemplate '%s' not found.\n", thingName.str()));
1036 }
1037}
1038
1039//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1041//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1042void ScriptActions::doAttack(const AsciiString& attackerName, const AsciiString& victimName)
1043{
1044 Team *attackingTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( attackerName );
1045 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
1046 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
1047 const Team *victimTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( victimName );
1048
1049 // sanity
1050 if( attackingTeam == NULL || victimTeam == NULL )
1051 return;
1052
1053 AIGroup *aiGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1054 if (!aiGroup) {
1055 return;
1056 }
1057
1058 attackingTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(aiGroup);
1059 aiGroup->groupAttackTeam(victimTeam, NO_MAX_SHOTS_LIMIT, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1060
1061}
1062
1063//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1065//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1066void ScriptActions::doNamedAttack(const AsciiString& attackerName, const AsciiString& victimName)
1067{
1069
1070 Object *attackingObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( attackerName );
1071 Object *victimObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( victimName );
1072
1073 if (!attackingObj || !victimObj) {
1074 return;
1075 }
1076 // tell every member of attacking team to attack a random member of victim team
1077
1078 {
1079 AIUpdateInterface *aiUpdate = attackingObj->getAIUpdateInterface();
1080
1081 if (aiUpdate)
1082 {
1084 attackingObj->leaveGroup();
1085 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1086 aiUpdate->aiForceAttackObject( victimObj, NO_MAX_SHOTS_LIMIT, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1087 }
1088 }
1089}
1090
1091//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1093//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1094void ScriptActions::doBuildBuilding(const AsciiString& buildingType)
1095{
1096 // This action ALWAYS occur on the current player.
1097 Player *thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getCurrentPlayer();
1098 if (thePlayer) {
1099 thePlayer->buildSpecificBuilding(buildingType);
1100 }
1101}
1102
1103//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1105//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1106void ScriptActions::doBuildSupplyCenter(const AsciiString& player, const AsciiString& buildingType, Int cash)
1107{
1108 Player* thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(player);
1109 if (thePlayer) {
1110 thePlayer->buildBySupplies(cash, buildingType);
1111 }
1112}
1113
1114//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1116//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1117void ScriptActions::doBuildObjectNearestTeam( const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& buildingType, const AsciiString& teamName )
1118{
1119 Player *thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString( playerName );
1120 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1121 if( thePlayer && theTeam )
1122 {
1123 thePlayer->buildSpecificBuildingNearestTeam( buildingType, theTeam );
1124 }
1125}
1126
1127//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1129//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1130void ScriptActions::doBuildUpgrade(const AsciiString& player, const AsciiString& upgrade)
1131{
1132 Player* thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(player);
1133 if (thePlayer) {
1134 thePlayer->buildUpgrade(upgrade);
1135 }
1136}

1141//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1142void ScriptActions::doBuildBaseDefense(Bool flank)
1143{
1144 // This action ALWAYS occur on the current player.
1145 Player *thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getCurrentPlayer();
1146 if (thePlayer) {
1147 thePlayer->buildBaseDefense(flank);
1148 }
1149}

1153//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1154void ScriptActions::doBuildBaseStructure(const AsciiString& buildingType, Bool flank)
1155{
1156 // This action ALWAYS occur on the current player.
1157 Player *thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getCurrentPlayer();
1158 if (thePlayer) {
1159 thePlayer->buildBaseDefenseStructure(buildingType, flank);
1160 }
1161}

1163
1164//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1166//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1167void ScriptActions::createUnitOnTeamAt(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& objType, const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypoint)
1168{
1169 Object* pOldObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
1170
1171 if (pOldObj && !pOldObj->isEffectivelyDead()) {
1172 AsciiString str = "WARNING - Object with name ";
1173 str.concat(unitName);
1174 str.concat(" already exists. Failed Create.");
1175 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(str, false);
1176 // Unit by that name already exists
1177 return;
1178 }
1179
1180 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1181 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
1182 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
1183 if (theTeam==NULL) {
1184 // We may need to create the team.
1185 theTeam = TheTeamFactory->createTeam( teamName );
1186 }
1187 if (!theTeam) {
1188 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage("***WARNING - Team not found:***", false);
1189 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, true);
1190 DEBUG_LOG(("WARNING - Team %s not found.\n", teamName.str()));
1191 return;
1192 }
1193 const ThingTemplate *thingTemplate;
1194 // get thing template based from map object name
1195 thingTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(objType);
1196 if (thingTemplate) {
1197 // create new object in the world
1198 Object *obj = TheThingFactory->newObject( thingTemplate, theTeam );
1199 if( obj )
1200 {
1201 if (unitName != m_unnamedUnit) {
1202 obj->setName(unitName);
1203 if (pOldObj || TheScriptEngine->didUnitExist(unitName)) {
1204 TheScriptEngine->transferObjectName(unitName, obj);
1205 } else {
1206 TheScriptEngine->addObjectToCache(obj);
1207 }
1208 }
1209
1210 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName( waypoint );
1211 if (way)
1212 {
1213 Coord3D destination = *way->getLocation();
1214 obj->setPosition(&destination);
1215 }
1216 } // end if
1217 } else {
1218 DEBUG_LOG(("WARNING - ThingTemplate '%s' not found.\n", objType.str()));
1219 }
1220}
1221
1222//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1224//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1225void ScriptActions::updateNamedAttackPrioritySet(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& attackPrioritySet)
1226{
1227 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
1228 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1229 return;
1230 }
1231
1232 AIUpdateInterface *pInterface = theSrcUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1233 if (!pInterface) {
1234 return;
1235 }
1236
1237 const AttackPriorityInfo *info = TheScriptEngine->getAttackInfo(attackPrioritySet);
1238
1239 pInterface->setAttackInfo(info);
1240
1241}
1242
1243//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1245//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1246void ScriptActions::updateTeamAttackPrioritySet(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& attackPrioritySet)
1247{
1248 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
1249
1250 if (!team) {
1251 return;
1252 }
1253
1254 const AttackPriorityInfo *info = TheScriptEngine->getAttackInfo(attackPrioritySet);
1255
1256 if (info->getName().isNotEmpty()) {
1257 team->setAttackPriorityName(info->getName());
1258 }
1259
1260 // Set team member's attack priority.
1261 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1262 {
1263 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1264 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
1265 if (!ai) {
1266 continue;
1267 }
1268 ai->setAttackInfo(info);
1269 }
1270}
1271
1272//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1274//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1275void ScriptActions::updateBaseConstructionSpeed(const AsciiString& playerName, Int delayInSeconds)
1276{
1277 Player* thePlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
1278 if (thePlayer) {
1279 thePlayer->setTeamDelaySeconds(delayInSeconds);
1280 }
1281}
1282
1283//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1285//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1286void ScriptActions::updateNamedSetAttitude(const AsciiString& unitName, Int attitude)
1287{
1288 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
1289 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1290 return;
1291 }
1292
1293 AIUpdateInterface *pInterface = theSrcUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1294 if (!pInterface) {
1295 return;
1296 }
1297
1298 pInterface->setAttitude((AttitudeType) attitude);
1299}
1300
1301//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1303//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1304void ScriptActions::updateTeamSetAttitude(const AsciiString& teamName, Int attitude)
1305{
1306 Team *theSrcTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
1307 if (!theSrcTeam) {
1308 return;
1309 }
1310
1311 AIGroup *pAIGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1312 if (!pAIGroup) {
1313 return;
1314 }
1315
1316 theSrcTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(pAIGroup);
1317 pAIGroup->setAttitude((AttitudeType) attitude);
1318}
1319
1320//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1322//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1323void ScriptActions::doNamedSetRepulsor(const AsciiString& unitName, Bool repulsor)
1324{
1325 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
1326 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1327 return;
1328 }
1329 theSrcUnit->setStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_REPULSOR ), repulsor);
1330}
1331
1332//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1334//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1335void ScriptActions::doTeamSetRepulsor(const AsciiString& teamName, Bool repulsor)
1336{
1337 Team *theSrcTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
1338 if (!theSrcTeam) {
1339 return;
1340 }
1341
1342 if (theSrcTeam)
1343 {
1344 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theSrcTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1345 {
1346 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1347 if (!obj)
1348 {
1349 continue;
1350 }
1351 obj->setStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_REPULSOR ), repulsor );
1352 }
1353 }
1354
1355}
1356
1357//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1359//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1360void ScriptActions::doNamedAttackArea(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& areaName)
1361{
1362 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1363 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1364 return;
1365 }
1366
1367 PolygonTrigger *pTrig = TheScriptEngine->getQualifiedTriggerAreaByName(areaName);
1368 if (!pTrig) {
1369 return;
1370 }
1371
1372
1373 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theSrcUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1374 if( !aiUpdate )
1375 {
1376 return;
1377 }
1378 theSrcUnit->leaveGroup();
1379 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1380 aiUpdate->aiAttackArea(pTrig, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1381}
1382
1383//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1385//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1386void ScriptActions::doNamedAttackTeam(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& teamName)
1387{
1388 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1389 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1390 return;
1391 }
1392
1393 const Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1394 if (!theTeam) {
1395 return;
1396 }
1397
1398 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theSrcUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1399 if (!aiUpdate) {
1400 return;
1401 }
1402
1403 theSrcUnit->leaveGroup();
1404 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1405 aiUpdate->aiAttackTeam(theTeam, NO_MAX_SHOTS_LIMIT, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1406}
1407
1408//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1410//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1411void ScriptActions::doTeamAttackArea(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& areaName)
1412{
1413 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1414 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
1415 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
1416 if (!theTeam) {
1417 return;
1418 }
1419
1420 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1421 if (!theGroup) {
1422 return;
1423 }
1424
1425 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1426
1427 PolygonTrigger *pTrig = TheScriptEngine->getQualifiedTriggerAreaByName(areaName);
1428 if (!pTrig) {
1429 return;
1430 }
1431
1432 theGroup->groupAttackArea(pTrig, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1433}
1434
1435//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1437//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1438void ScriptActions::doTeamAttackNamed(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& unitName)
1439{
1440 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1441 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
1442 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
1443 if (!theTeam) {
1444 return;
1445 }
1446
1447 Object *theVictim = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1448 if (!theVictim) {
1449 return;
1450 }
1451
1452 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1453 if (!theGroup) {
1454 return;
1455 }
1456
1457 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1458 theGroup->groupAttackObject(theVictim, NO_MAX_SHOTS_LIMIT, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1459}
1460
1461//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1463//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1464void ScriptActions::doLoadAllTransports(const AsciiString& teamName)
1465{
1466 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1467 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
1468 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
1469 if (!theTeam) {
1470 return;
1471 }
1472
1473 EntriesVec vecOfUnits;
1474 SpacesVec vecOfTransports;
1475
1476 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1477 {
1478 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1479 if (!obj) {
1480 continue;
1481 }
1482
1483 if( obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_TRANSPORT) )
1484 {
1485 ContainModuleInterface *contain = obj->getContain();
1486 if( contain )
1487 {
1488 vecOfTransports.push_back(std::make_pair(obj->getID(), ((TransportContain*)obj->getContain())->getContainMax()));
1489 }
1490 else
1491 {
1492 DEBUG_CRASH( ("doLoadAllTransports script -- transport doesn't have a container!") );
1493 }
1494 }
1495 else
1496 {
1497 vecOfUnits.push_back(std::make_pair(obj->getID(), obj->getTransportSlotCount()));
1498 }
1499 }
1500
1501 // we've now built the necessary stuff. Partition the units.
1502
1503 PartitionSolver partition(vecOfUnits, vecOfTransports, PREFER_FAST_SOLUTION);
1504 partition.solve();
1505 SolutionVec solution = partition.getSolution();
1506 for (int i = 0; i < solution.size(); ++i) {
1507 Object *unit = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(solution[i].first);
1508 Object *trans = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(solution[i].second);
1509 if (!unit || !trans) {
1510 continue;
1511 }
1512 if( unit->getAIUpdateInterface() )
1513 {
1514 unit->getAIUpdateInterface()->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1515 unit->getAIUpdateInterface()->aiEnter(trans, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1516 }
1517 }
1518}
1519
1520//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1522//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1523void ScriptActions::doNamedEnterNamed(const AsciiString& unitSrcName, const AsciiString& unitDestName)
1524{
1525 Object *theSrcUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitSrcName );
1526 if (!theSrcUnit) {
1527 return;
1528 }
1529
1530 Object *theTransport = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitDestName );
1531 if (!theTransport) {
1532 return;
1533 }
1534
1535 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theSrcUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1536 if (!aiUpdate) {
1537 return;
1538 }
1539 theSrcUnit->leaveGroup();
1540 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1541 aiUpdate->aiEnter(theTransport, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1542}
1543
1544//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1546//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1547void ScriptActions::doTeamEnterNamed(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& unitDestName)
1548{
1549 Team *theSrcTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1550 if (!theSrcTeam) {
1551 return;
1552 }
1553
1554 Object *theTransport = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitDestName );
1555 if (!theTransport) {
1556 return;
1557 }
1558
1559 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1560 theSrcTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1561
1562 theGroup->groupEnter(theTransport, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1563}
1564
1565//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1567//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1568void ScriptActions::doNamedExitAll(const AsciiString& unitName)
1569{
1570 Object *theTransport = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1571 if (!theTransport) {
1572 return;
1573 }
1574
1575 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theTransport->getAIUpdateInterface();
1576 if (!aiUpdate) {
1577 return;
1578 }
1579
1580 theTransport->leaveGroup();
1581 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1582 aiUpdate->aiEvacuate( FALSE, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1583}
1584
1585//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1587//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1588void ScriptActions::doTeamExitAll(const AsciiString& teamName)
1589{
1590 Team *theTeamOfTransports = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1591 if (!theTeamOfTransports) {
1592 return;
1593 }
1594
1595 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1596 theTeamOfTransports->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1597
1598 theGroup->groupEvacuate( CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1599}
1600
1601
1602//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1604//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1605void ScriptActions::doNamedSetGarrisonEvacDisposition(const AsciiString& unitName, UnsignedInt disp )
1606{
1607 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1608 if (!theUnit) {
1609 return;
1610 }
1611
1612 ContainModuleInterface *contain = theUnit->getContain();
1613 if( contain )
1614 contain->setEvacDisposition( (EvacDisposition)disp );
1615 // should be safe to cast any-old int to this enum,
1616 // since only 1(EVAC_TO_LEFT) and 2(EVAC_TO_RIGHT) differ from default case
1617
1618}
1619
1620
1621
1622
1623//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1625//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1626void ScriptActions::doNamedFollowWaypoints(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel)
1627{
1628 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1629 if (!theUnit) {
1630 return;
1631 }
1632 Coord3D pos = *theUnit->getPosition();
1633 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1634 if (!aiUpdate) {
1635 return;
1636 }
1637
1638 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
1639 if (!way) {
1640 return;
1641 }
1642
1643 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, waypointPathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1644
1645 theUnit->leaveGroup();
1646 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1647 aiUpdate->aiFollowWaypointPath(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1648}
1649
1650//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1652//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1653void ScriptActions::doNamedFollowWaypointsExact(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel)
1654{
1655 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1656 if (!theUnit) {
1657 return;
1658 }
1659 Coord3D pos = *theUnit->getPosition();
1660 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1661 if (!aiUpdate) {
1662 return;
1663 }
1664
1665 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
1666 if (!way) {
1667 return;
1668 }
1669
1670 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, waypointPathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1671
1672 theUnit->leaveGroup();
1673 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1674 aiUpdate->aiFollowWaypointPathExact(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1675}
1676
1677//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1679//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1680void ScriptActions::doTeamFollowSkirmishApproachPath(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel, Bool asTeam)
1681{
1682 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1683 if (!theTeam) {
1684 return;
1685 }
1686
1687 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1688 if (!theGroup) {
1689 return;
1690 }
1691 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1692 Int count = 0;
1693 Coord3D pos;
1694 pos.x=pos.y=pos.z=0;
1695
1696 Object *firstUnit=NULL;
1697 // Get the center point for the team
1698 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1699 {
1700 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1701 Coord3D objPos = *obj->getPosition();
1702 pos.x += objPos.x;
1703 pos.y += objPos.y;
1704 pos.z += objPos.z; // Not actually used by getClosestWaypointOnPath, but hey, might as well be correct.
1705 count++;
1706 if (firstUnit==NULL) {
1707 firstUnit = obj;
1708 }
1709 }
1710 if (count==0) return; // empty team.
1711 pos.x /= count;
1712 pos.y /= count;
1713 pos.z /= count;
1714
1715 Player *enemyPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getSkirmishEnemyPlayer();
1716 if (enemyPlayer==NULL) return;
1717 Int mpNdx = enemyPlayer->getMpStartIndex()+1;
1718
1719 AsciiString pathLabel;
1720 pathLabel.format("%s%d", waypointPathLabel.str(), mpNdx);
1721 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, pathLabel );
1722 if (!way) {
1723 return;
1724 }
1725
1726 Player *aiPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getCurrentPlayer();
1727 if (aiPlayer && firstUnit) {
1728 aiPlayer->checkBridges(firstUnit, way);
1729 }
1730
1731 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, pathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1732 if (asTeam)
1733 {
1734 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPathAsTeam(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1735 } else {
1736 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPath(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1737 }
1738}
1739
1740//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1742//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1743void ScriptActions::doTeamMoveToSkirmishApproachPath(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel)
1744{
1745 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1746 if (!theTeam) {
1747 return;
1748 }
1749
1750 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1751 if (!theGroup) {
1752 return;
1753 }
1754 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1755 Int count = 0;
1756 Coord3D pos;
1757 pos.x=pos.y=pos.z=0;
1758
1759 // Get the center point for the team
1760 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1761 {
1762 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1763 Coord3D objPos = *obj->getPosition();
1764 pos.x += objPos.x;
1765 pos.y += objPos.y;
1766 pos.z += objPos.z; // Not actually used by getClosestWaypointOnPath, but hey, might as well be correct.
1767 count++;
1768 }
1769 if (count==0) return; // empty team.
1770 pos.x /= count;
1771 pos.y /= count;
1772 pos.z /= count;
1773
1774 Player *enemyPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getSkirmishEnemyPlayer();
1775 if (enemyPlayer==NULL) return;
1776 Int mpNdx = enemyPlayer->getMpStartIndex()+1;
1777
1778 AsciiString pathLabel;
1779 pathLabel.format("%s%d", waypointPathLabel.str(), mpNdx);
1780 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, pathLabel );
1781 if (!way) {
1782 return;
1783 }
1784 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, pathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1785 theGroup->groupMoveToPosition(way->getLocation(), false, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1786}
1787
1788//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1790//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1791void ScriptActions::doTeamFollowWaypoints(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel, Bool asTeam)
1792{
1793 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1794 if (!theTeam) {
1795 return;
1796 }
1797
1798 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1799 if (!theGroup) {
1800 return;
1801 }
1802 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1803 Int count = 0;
1804 Coord3D pos;
1805 pos.x=pos.y=pos.z=0;
1806
1807 // Get the center point for the team
1808 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1809 {
1810 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1811 Coord3D objPos = *obj->getPosition();
1812 pos.x += objPos.x;
1813 pos.y += objPos.y;
1814 pos.z += objPos.z; // Not actually used by getClosestWaypointOnPath, but hey, might as well be correct.
1815 count++;
1816 }
1817 if (count==0) return; // empty team.
1818 pos.x /= count;
1819 pos.y /= count;
1820 pos.z /= count;
1821
1822 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
1823 if (!way) {
1824 return;
1825 }
1826 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, waypointPathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1827 if (asTeam)
1828 {
1829 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPathAsTeam(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1830 } else {
1831 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPath(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1832 }
1833}
1834
1835//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1837//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1838void ScriptActions::doTeamFollowWaypointsExact(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel, Bool asTeam)
1839{
1840 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1841 if (!theTeam) {
1842 return;
1843 }
1844
1845 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1846 if (!theGroup) {
1847 return;
1848 }
1849 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1850 Int count = 0;
1851 Coord3D pos;
1852 pos.x=pos.y=pos.z=0;
1853
1854 // Get the center point for the team
1855 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1856 {
1857 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1858 Coord3D objPos = *obj->getPosition();
1859 pos.x += objPos.x;
1860 pos.y += objPos.y;
1861 pos.z += objPos.z; // Not actually used by getClosestWaypointOnPath, but hey, might as well be correct.
1862 count++;
1863 }
1864 if (count==0) return; // empty team.
1865 pos.x /= count;
1866 pos.y /= count;
1867 pos.z /= count;
1868
1869 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
1870 if (!way) {
1871 return;
1872 }
1873 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, waypointPathLabel), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
1874 if (asTeam)
1875 {
1876 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPathAsTeamExact(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1877 } else {
1878 theGroup->groupFollowWaypointPathExact(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1879 }
1880}
1881
1882//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1884//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1885void ScriptActions::doNamedGuard(const AsciiString& unitName)
1886{
1887 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1888 if (!theUnit) {
1889 return;
1890 }
1891
1892 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1893 if (!aiUpdate) {
1894 return;
1895 }
1896
1897 theUnit->leaveGroup();
1898 Coord3D position = *theUnit->getPosition();
1899 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
1900 aiUpdate->aiGuardPosition(&position, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1901}
1902
1903//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1905//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1906void ScriptActions::doTeamGuard(const AsciiString& teamName)
1907{
1908 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1909 if (!theTeam) {
1910 return;
1911 }
1912
1913 // Have all the members of the team guard at their current pos.
1914 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1915 {
1916 Object *obj = iter.cur();
1917 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
1918 if (!ai) {
1919 continue;
1920 }
1921 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
1922 ai->aiGuardPosition(&pos, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
1923 }
1924}
1925
1926//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1928//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1929void ScriptActions::doTeamGuardPosition(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointName)
1930{
1931 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
1932 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1933 if (!theTeam || !way) {
1934 return;
1935 }
1936
1937 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1938 if (!theGroup) {
1939 return;
1940 }
1941 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1942 Coord3D position = *way->getLocation();
1943
1944 theGroup->groupGuardPosition( &position, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1945}
1946
1947//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1949//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1950void ScriptActions::doTeamGuardObject(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& unitName)
1951{
1952 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1953 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1954 if (!theTeam || !theUnit) {
1955 return;
1956 }
1957
1958 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1959 if (!theGroup) {
1960 return;
1961 }
1962 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1963
1964 theGroup->groupGuardObject( theUnit, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1965}
1966
1967//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1969//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1970void ScriptActions::doTeamGuardArea(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& areaName)
1971{
1972 PolygonTrigger *pTrig = TheScriptEngine->getQualifiedTriggerAreaByName(areaName);
1973 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
1974 if (!theTeam || !pTrig) {
1975 return;
1976 }
1977
1978 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
1979 if (!theGroup) {
1980 return;
1981 }
1982 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
1983
1984 theGroup->groupGuardArea( pTrig, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
1985}
1986
1987//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1989//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1990void ScriptActions::doNamedHunt(const AsciiString& unitName)
1991{
1992 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
1993 if (!theUnit) {
1994 return;
1995 }
1996
1997 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1998 if (!aiUpdate) {
1999 return;
2000 }
2001
2002 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
2003 aiUpdate->aiHunt( CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
2004}
2005
2006//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2008//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2009void ScriptActions::doTeamHunt(const AsciiString& teamName)
2010{
2011 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
2012 if (!theTeam) {
2013 return;
2014 }
2015
2016 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
2017 if (!theGroup) {
2018 return;
2019 }
2020 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
2021
2022 theGroup->groupHunt( CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
2023}
2024//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2026//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2027void ScriptActions::doTeamHuntWithCommandButton(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& ability)
2028{
2029 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
2030 if (!theTeam) {
2031 return;
2032 }
2033
2034
2035 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( ability );
2036 if( !commandButton )
2037 {
2038 return;
2039 }
2040
2041 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
2042 {
2043
2044 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
2045 if( commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate() )
2046 {
2047 if (BitTest( commandButton->getOptions(), COMMAND_OPTION_NEED_OBJECT_TARGET ))
2048 {
2049 // OK, we can hunt with a power that targets an object.
2050 break;
2051 }
2052 AsciiString msg = "ERROR-Team hunt with command button - cannot hunt with ability ";
2053 msg.concat(ability);
2054 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2055 return;
2056 }
2057 return;
2058 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
2059 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
2060 {
2061 // ok, we can hunt with a weapon.
2062 break;
2063 }
2064
2065 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
2066 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
2067 case GUICOMMANDMODE_SABOTAGE_BUILDING:
2068 //Various enter type hunts.
2069 break;
2070
2071 case GUI_COMMAND_OBJECT_UPGRADE:
2072 case GUI_COMMAND_PLAYER_UPGRADE:
2073 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT:
2074 case GUI_COMMAND_DOZER_CONSTRUCT_CANCEL:
2075 case GUI_COMMAND_UNIT_BUILD:
2076 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UNIT_BUILD:
2077 case GUI_COMMAND_CANCEL_UPGRADE:
2078 case GUI_COMMAND_ATTACK_MOVE:
2079 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD:
2080 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_WITHOUT_PURSUIT:
2081 case GUI_COMMAND_GUARD_FLYING_UNITS_ONLY:
2082 case GUI_COMMAND_WAYPOINTS:
2083 case GUI_COMMAND_EXIT_CONTAINER:
2084 case GUI_COMMAND_EVACUATE:
2085 case GUI_COMMAND_EXECUTE_RAILED_TRANSPORT:
2086 case GUI_COMMAND_BEACON_DELETE:
2087 case GUI_COMMAND_SET_RALLY_POINT:
2088 case GUI_COMMAND_SELL:
2089 case GUI_COMMAND_HACK_INTERNET:
2090 case GUI_COMMAND_TOGGLE_OVERCHARGE:
2091#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
2092 case GUI_COMMAND_POW_RETURN_TO_PRISON:
2093#endif
2094#ifdef ALLOW_SURRENDER
2095 case GUICOMMANDMODE_PICK_UP_PRISONER:
2096#endif
2097 default:
2098 {
2099 AsciiString msg = "ERROR-Team hunt with command button - cannot hunt with ability ";
2100 msg.concat(ability);
2101 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2102 return;
2103 }
2104 break;
2105 }
2106
2107
2108 // Have all the members of the team do the command button.
2109 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2110 {
2111 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2112 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2113 if (!ai) {
2114 continue;
2115 }
2116 Bool foundCommand = false;
2117 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( obj->getCommandSetString( ) );
2118 if( commandSet )
2119 {
2120 for( int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; i++ )
2121 {
2122 const CommandButton *aCommandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(i);
2123 if( commandButton == aCommandButton )
2124 {
2125 //We found the matching command button so now order the unit to do what the button wants.
2126 foundCommand = true;
2127 break;
2128 }
2129 }
2130 }
2131 if (!foundCommand) {
2132 AsciiString msg = "Error - Team hunt with command button - unit type '";
2133 msg.concat(obj->getTemplate()->getName().str());
2134 msg.concat("' is not valid for ability ");
2135 msg.concat(ability);
2136 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2137 continue;
2138
2139 }
2140
2141 switch( commandButton->getCommandType() )
2142 {
2143
2144 case GUI_COMMAND_FIRE_WEAPON:
2145 case GUI_COMMAND_SWITCH_WEAPON:
2146 case GUI_COMMAND_SPECIAL_POWER:
2147 case GUICOMMANDMODE_HIJACK_VEHICLE:
2148 case GUICOMMANDMODE_CONVERT_TO_CARBOMB:
2149 case GUICOMMANDMODE_SABOTAGE_BUILDING:
2150 {
2151 static NameKeyType key_CommandButtonHuntUpdate = NAMEKEY("CommandButtonHuntUpdate");
2152
2153 CommandButtonHuntUpdate* huntUpdate = (CommandButtonHuntUpdate*)obj->findUpdateModule(key_CommandButtonHuntUpdate);
2154 if( huntUpdate )
2155 {
2156 huntUpdate->setCommandButton(ability);
2157 } else {
2158 AsciiString msg = "Error - Team hunt with command button - unit type '";
2159 msg.concat(obj->getTemplate()->getName().str());
2160 msg.concat("' requires CommandButtonHuntUpdate in .ini definition to hunt with ");
2161 msg.concat(ability);
2162 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2163 } // end if
2164 }
2165 break;
2166
2167 }
2168
2169 }
2170
2171}
2172
2173//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2175//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2176void ScriptActions::doPlayerHunt(const AsciiString& playerName)
2177{
2178 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2179
2180 if (!pPlayer) {
2181 return;
2182 }
2183 pPlayer->setUnitsShouldHunt(true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
2184}
2185
2186//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2188//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2189void ScriptActions::doPlayerSellEverything(const AsciiString& playerName)
2190{
2191 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2192
2193 if (!pPlayer) {
2194 return;
2195 }
2196 pPlayer->sellEverythingUnderTheSun();
2197}

2202void ScriptActions::doPlayerDisableBaseConstruction(const AsciiString& playerName)
2203{
2204 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2205
2206 if (!pPlayer) {
2207 return;
2208 }
2209 pPlayer->setCanBuildBase(false);
2210}

2215void ScriptActions::doPlayerDisableFactories(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& objectName)
2216{

2218
2219 if (!pPlayer) {
2220 return;
2221 }
2222 pPlayer->setObjectsEnabled(objectName, false);
2223}

2233 return;

2265//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2267//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2268void ScriptActions::doPlayerRepairStructure(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& structureName)
2269{
2270 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2271
2272 if (!pPlayer) {
2273 return;
2274 }
2275 Object *pStructure = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(structureName);
2276
2277 if (!pStructure) {
2278 return;
2279 }
2280 pPlayer->repairStructure(pStructure->getID());
2281}
2282
2283//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2286void ScriptActions::doPlayerEnableUnitConstruction(const AsciiString& playerName)
2287{
2288 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2289
2290 if (!pPlayer) {
2291 return;
2292 }
2293
2294 pPlayer->setCanBuildUnits(true);
2295}
