2297//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2299//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2300void ScriptActions::doCameraMoveHome(void)
2301{
2302
2303}
2304
2305//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2307//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2308void ScriptActions::doBuildTeam(const AsciiString& teamName)
2309{
2310 TeamPrototype *theTeamProto = TheTeamFactory->findTeamPrototype( teamName );
2311 if (theTeamProto) {
2312 Player *player = theTeamProto->getControllingPlayer();
2313 if (player) {
2314 player->buildSpecificTeam(theTeamProto);
2315 }
2316 }
2317}
2318
2319//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2321//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2322void ScriptActions::doRecruitTeam(const AsciiString& teamName, Real recruitRadius)
2323{
2324 TeamPrototype *theTeamProto = TheTeamFactory->findTeamPrototype( teamName );
2325 if (theTeamProto) {
2326 Player *player = theTeamProto->getControllingPlayer();
2327 if (player) {
2328 player->recruitSpecificTeam(theTeamProto, recruitRadius);
2329 }
2330 }
2331}
2332
2333//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2335//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2336void ScriptActions::doNamedDamage(const AsciiString& unitName, Int damageAmt)
2337{
2338 Object *pUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
2339
2340 if (!pUnit) {
2341 return;
2342 }
2343 DamageInfo damageInfo;
2344 damageInfo.in.m_damageType = DAMAGE_UNRESISTABLE;
2345 damageInfo.in.m_deathType = DEATH_NORMAL;
2346 damageInfo.in.m_sourceID = INVALID_ID;
2347 damageInfo.in.m_amount = damageAmt;
2348 pUnit->attemptDamage( &damageInfo );
2349}
2350
2351//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2353//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2354void ScriptActions::doNamedDelete(const AsciiString& unitName)
2355{
2356 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
2357 if (!theUnit) {
2358 return;
2359 }
2360
2361 TheGameLogic->destroyObject(theUnit);
2362}
2363
2364//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2366//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2367void ScriptActions::doTeamDelete(const AsciiString& teamName, Bool ignoreDead)
2368{
2369 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2370
2371 if (!team) {
2372 return;
2373 }
2374
2375 team->deleteTeam(ignoreDead);
2376}
2377
2378//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2380//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2381void ScriptActions::doTeamWander(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel)
2382{
2383 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2384
2385 if (!team) {
2386 return;
2387 }
2388
2389 // Have all the members of the team wander.
2390 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2391 {
2392 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2393 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2394 if (!ai) {
2395 continue;
2396 }
2397 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
2398 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
2399 if (!way) {
2400 return;
2401 }
2402 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_WANDER);
2403 ai->aiWander(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
2404 }
2405}
2406
2407//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2409//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2410void ScriptActions::doTeamIncreasePriority(const AsciiString& teamName)
2411{
2412 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2413
2414 if (!team) {
2415 return;
2416 }
2417 const TeamPrototype *theTeamProto = team->getPrototype();
2418
2419 if (!theTeamProto) {
2420 return;
2421 }
2422 theTeamProto->increaseAIPriorityForSuccess();
2423 AsciiString msg;
2424 msg.format("Team '%s' priority increased to %d for success.", teamName.str(), theTeamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority);
2425 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2426
2427}
2428
2429//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2431//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2432void ScriptActions::doTeamDecreasePriority(const AsciiString& teamName)
2433{
2434 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2435
2436 if (!team) {
2437 return;
2438 }
2439 const TeamPrototype *theTeamProto = team->getPrototype();
2440
2441 if (!theTeamProto) {
2442 return;
2443 }
2444 theTeamProto->decreaseAIPriorityForFailure();
2445 AsciiString msg;
2446 msg.format("Team '%s' priority decreased to %d for failure.", teamName.str(), theTeamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority);
2447 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(msg, false);
2448
2449}
2450
2451//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2453//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2454void ScriptActions::doTeamWanderInPlace(const AsciiString& teamName)
2455{
2456 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2457
2458 if (!team) {
2459 return;
2460 }
2461
2462 // Have all the members of the team wander.
2463 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2464 {
2465 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2466 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2467 if (!ai) {
2468 continue;
2469 }
2470 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_WANDER);
2471 ai->aiWanderInPlace(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
2472 }
2473}
2474
2475//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2477//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2478void ScriptActions::doTeamPanic(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& waypointPathLabel)
2479{
2480 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
2481
2482 if (!team) {
2483 return;
2484 }
2485
2486 // Get the center point for the team
2487 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2488 {
2489 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2490 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2491 if (!ai) {
2492 continue;
2493 }
2494 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
2495 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPathLabel );
2496 if (!way) {
2497 return;
2498 }
2499 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_PANIC);
2500 ai->aiPanic(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
2501 }
2502}
2503

2511 if (!pUnit) {
2512 return;
2513 }
2514 pUnit->kill();

2525 return;

2528 team->killTeam();

2552//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2554//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2555void ScriptActions::doInGamePopupMessage( const AsciiString& message, Int x, Int y, Int width, Bool pause )
2556{

2558}
2559
2560//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2562//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2563void ScriptActions::doDisplayCinematicText(const AsciiString& displayText, const AsciiString& fontType, Int timeInSeconds)
2564{
2565 // set the text
2566 UnicodeString uStr = TheGameText->fetch( displayText );
2567 AsciiString aStr;
2568 aStr.translate( uStr );
2569 TheDisplay->setCinematicText( aStr );
2570
2571 // Gets the font info from parsing through fontType
2572
2573 // get the font name
2574 AsciiString fontName = AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
2575 char buf[256];
2576 char *c;
2577 strcpy(buf, fontType.str());
2578 for( c = buf; c != '\0'; *c++ )
2579 {
2580 if( *c != ' ' && *c++ != '-' )
2581 fontName.concat(c);
2582 else
2583 break;
2584 }
2585 while( *c != ':' )
2586 *c++;
2587 *c++; // eat through " - Size:"
2588
2589 // get font size
2590 AsciiString fontSize = AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
2591 for( ; *c != '\0'; *c++ )
2592 {
2593 if( *c != '\0' && *c != ' ' )
2594 {
2595 fontSize.concat( *c );
2596 }
2597 else
2598 {
2599 break;
2600 }
2601 }
2602 Int size = atoi( fontSize.str() );
2603
2604 // get font fold
2605 Bool bold = FALSE;
2606 if( fontType.endsWith( "[Bold]" ) )
2607 bold = TRUE;
2608
2609 // phew, now set as new font
2610 GameFont *font = TheFontLibrary->getFont( fontName,
2611 TheGlobalLanguageData->adjustFontSize(size), bold );
2612 TheDisplay->setCinematicFont( font );
2613
2614 // set time
2615 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * timeInSeconds;
2616 TheDisplay->setCinematicTextFrames( frames );
2617}
2618//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2620//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2621void ScriptActions::doCameoFlash(const AsciiString& name, Int timeInSeconds)
2622{
2623 const CommandButton *button;
2624
2625 //sanity
2626 button = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( name );
2627 if( button == NULL )
2628 {
2629 DEBUG_CRASH(( "ScriptActions::doCameoFlash can't find AsciiString cameoflash" ));
2630 }
2631
2632 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * timeInSeconds;
2633 // every time the framecount % 20 == 0, controlbar:: update will do Cameo Flash
2634 Int count = frames / DRAWABLE_FRAMES_PER_FLASH;
2635 // make sure count is even, so the cameo will return to its original state
2636 if( count % 2 == 1 )
2637 count++;
2638
2639 button->setFlashCount(count);
2640 TheControlBar->setFlash( TRUE );
2641
2642}
2643
2644//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2646//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2647void ScriptActions::doNamedCustomColor(const AsciiString& unitName, Color c)
2648{
2649 //sanity
2650 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
2651 if ( !obj )
2652 {
2653 return;
2654 }
2655 obj->setCustomIndicatorColor(c);
2656}
2657
2658//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2660//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2661void ScriptActions::doNamedFlash(const AsciiString& unitName, Int timeInSeconds, const RGBColor *color)
2662{
2666
2667 //sanity
2668 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
2669 if ( !obj )
2670 {
2671 return;
2672 }
2673 Drawable *drawable = obj->getDrawable();
2674 if( !drawable )
2675 {
2676 return;
2677 }
2678
2679 if( timeInSeconds > 0 )
2680 {
2681 // set count for drawable, but do not flash, allow drawable update to handle it
2682
2683 /* The designer specifies how long he wants the unit to flash for. We will
2684 convert this number into a count of how many times to call the doNamedFlash method */
2685 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * timeInSeconds;
2686 // every time the framecount % 20 == 0, drawable::update will call doNamedFlash
2687 Int count = frames / DRAWABLE_FRAMES_PER_FLASH;
2688 Color flashy = (color == NULL) ? obj->getIndicatorColor() : color->getAsInt();
2689 drawable->setFlashColor( flashy );
2690 drawable->setFlashCount( count );
2691 return;
2692 }
2693}
2694
2695//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2697//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2698void ScriptActions::doTeamFlash(const AsciiString& teamName, Int timeInSeconds, const RGBColor *color)
2699{
2700 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
2701 if (team == NULL || !team->hasAnyObjects())
2702 return;
2703
2704 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList();
2705
2706 while( !iter.done() ) {
2707 Object *nextObj = iter.cur();
2708 Object *obj = nextObj;
2709 if (!obj) {
2710 break;
2711 }
2712
2713 iter.advance();
2714 Drawable *draw = obj->getDrawable();
2715 if( !draw )
2716 break;
2717 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * timeInSeconds;
2718
2719 Int count = frames / DRAWABLE_FRAMES_PER_FLASH;
2720 Color flashy = (color == NULL) ? obj->getIndicatorColor() : color->getAsInt();
2721 draw->setFlashColor( flashy );
2722 draw->setFlashCount( count );
2723 }
2724
2725}
2726
2727#define ARBITRARY_BUFFER_SIZE 128
2728//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2730//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2731void ScriptActions::doMoviePlayFullScreen(const AsciiString& movieName)
2732{
2733 TheDisplay->playMovie(movieName);
2734}
2735
2736//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2738//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2739void ScriptActions::doMoviePlayRadar(const AsciiString& movieName)
2740{
2741 TheInGameUI->playMovie(movieName);
2742}
2743
2744//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2746//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2747void ScriptActions::doSoundPlayFromNamed(const AsciiString& soundName, const AsciiString& unitName)
2748{
2749 Object *pUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
2750
2751 if (!pUnit) {
2752 return;
2753 }
2754
2755 AudioEventRTS sfx(soundName, pUnit->getID());
2756 sfx.setIsLogicalAudio(true);
2757 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&sfx);
2758}
2759
2760//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2762//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2763enum
2764{
2765 SUBTITLE_DURATION = 8000
2766};
2767void ScriptActions::doSpeechPlay(const AsciiString& speechName, Bool allowOverlap)
2768{
2769 AudioEventRTS speech(speechName);
2770 speech.setIsLogicalAudio(true);
2771 speech.setPlayerIndex(ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer()->getPlayerIndex());
2772 speech.setUninterruptable(!allowOverlap);
2773 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&speech);
2774
2775
2776 AsciiString subtitleLabel("DIALOGEVENT:");
2777 subtitleLabel.concat(speechName);
2778 subtitleLabel.concat("Subtitle");
2779
2780 // Found is important, because a failure will return a valid "Missing: 'Label'" string.
2781 Bool found = FALSE;
2782 UnicodeString subtitle = TheGameText->fetch(subtitleLabel, &found);
2783 if( found && !subtitle.isEmpty() && subtitle.getCharAt(0) != '*')
2784 {
2785 // Foreign versions can specify region specifc subtitle strings if they want.
2786 // English will have strings with / for easy translation, but they don't want to display.
2787 TheInGameUI->militarySubtitle( subtitleLabel, SUBTITLE_DURATION );
2788 }
2789}
2790
2791//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2793//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2794void ScriptActions::doPlayerTransferAssetsToPlayer(const AsciiString& playerSrcName, const AsciiString& playerDstName)
2795{
2796 Player *pPlayerDest = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerDstName);
2797 Player *pPlayerSrc = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerSrcName);
2798
2799 if (!pPlayerDest || !pPlayerSrc) {
2800 return;
2801 }
2802
2803 pPlayerDest->transferAssetsFromThat(pPlayerSrc);
2804}
2805
2806//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2808//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2809void ScriptActions::doNamedTransferAssetsToPlayer(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& playerDstName)
2810{
2811 Object *pObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
2812 Player *pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerDstName);
2813
2814 if (!pObj || !pPlayer) {
2815 return;
2816 }
2817
2818 Team *playerTeam = pPlayer->getDefaultTeam();
2819 if (!playerTeam) {
2820 return;
2821 }
2822
2823 pObj->setTeam(playerTeam);
2824 updateTeamAndPlayerStuff(pObj, NULL);
2825}
2826
2827//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2829//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2830void ScriptActions::excludePlayerFromScoreScreen(const AsciiString& playerName)
2831{
2832 Player *pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
2833 if (pPlayer == NULL) {
2834 return;
2835 }
2836
2837 pPlayer->setListInScoreScreen(FALSE);
2838}

2840//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2843void ScriptActions::enableScoring(Bool score)
2844{
2845 TheGameLogic->enableScoring(score);
2846}

2848//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2850//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2851void ScriptActions::updatePlayerRelationTowardPlayer(const AsciiString& playerSrcName, Int relationType, const AsciiString& playerDstName)
2852{
2853 Player *pPlayerDest = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerDstName);
2854 Player *pPlayerSrc = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerSrcName);
2855
2856 if (!pPlayerDest || !pPlayerSrc) {
2857 return;
2858 }
2859
2860 pPlayerSrc->setPlayerRelationship(pPlayerDest, (Relationship) relationType);
2861}

2863//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2865//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2866void ScriptActions::doRadarCreateEvent(Coord3D *pos, Int eventType)
2867{
2868 TheRadar->createEvent(pos, (RadarEventType)eventType);
2869}
2870
2871//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2873//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2874void ScriptActions::doObjectRadarCreateEvent(const AsciiString& unitName, Int eventType)
2875{
2876 // get the building
2877 Object *theBuilding = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
2878 if (!theBuilding)
2879 return;
2880
2881 // get building's position
2882 const Coord3D *pos = theBuilding->getPosition();
2883 if (!pos)
2884 return;
2885
2886 // create event
2887 TheRadar->createEvent(pos, (RadarEventType)eventType);
2888}
2889
2890//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2892//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2893void ScriptActions::doTeamRadarCreateEvent(const AsciiString& teamName, Int eventType)
2894{
2895 // get the team
2896 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
2897 if (!theTeam)
2898 return;
2899 if (!theTeam->hasAnyUnits())
2900 return;
2901
2902 // get team's position
2903 const Coord3D *pos = theTeam->getEstimateTeamPosition();
2904 if (!pos)
2905 return;
2906
2907 // create event
2908 TheRadar->createEvent(pos, (RadarEventType)eventType);
2909}
2910
2911//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2913//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2914void ScriptActions::doRadarDisable(void)
2915{
2916 TheRadar->hide(true);
2917}
2918
2919//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2921//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2922void ScriptActions::doRadarEnable(void)
2923{
2924 TheRadar->hide(false);
2925}
2926
2927//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2929//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2930void ScriptActions::doCameraMotionBlurJump(const AsciiString& waypointName, Bool saturate)
2931{
2932 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
2933 if (!way) {
2934 return;
2935 }
2936
2937 Bool passed = FALSE; //assume all filters were applied correctly.
2938 Coord3D pos = *way->getLocation();
2939 if (TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_VIEW_MOTION_BLUR_FILTER))
2940 {
2941 passed = TRUE;
2942 if (saturate) {
2943 if (!TheTacticalView->setViewFilterMode(FM_VIEW_MB_IN_AND_OUT_SATURATE))
2944 { //failed to set filter so restore default state
2945 TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_NULL_FILTER);
2946 passed = FALSE;
2947 }
2948 } else {
2949 if (!TheTacticalView->setViewFilterMode(FM_VIEW_MB_IN_AND_OUT_ALPHA))
2950 { //failed to set filter so restore default state
2951 TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_NULL_FILTER);
2952 passed = FALSE;
2953 };
2954 }
2955 if (passed)
2956 TheTacticalView->setViewFilterPos(&pos);
2957 }
2958 if (!passed)
2959 { //if we failed to apply the filter, we still need to get the camera to the target
2960 //so do it another way:
2961 TheTacticalView->lookAt(&pos);
2962 }
2963}
2964
2965//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2967//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2968void ScriptActions::doCameraMotionBlur(Bool zoomIn, Bool saturate)
2969{
2970 if (TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_VIEW_MOTION_BLUR_FILTER))
2971 {
2972 enum FilterModes mode;
2973 if (saturate) {
2974 if (zoomIn) {
2975 mode = FM_VIEW_MB_IN_SATURATE;
2976 } else {
2977 mode = FM_VIEW_MB_OUT_SATURATE;
2978 }
2979 } else {
2980 if (zoomIn) {
2981 mode = FM_VIEW_MB_IN_ALPHA;
2982 } else {
2983 mode = FM_VIEW_MB_OUT_ALPHA;
2984 }
2985 }
2986 if (!TheTacticalView->setViewFilterMode(mode))
2987 { //failed to set the filter so restore everything to normal
2988 TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_NULL_FILTER);
2989 }
2990 }
2991}
2992
2993static PlayerMaskType getHumanPlayerMask( void )
2994{
2995 PlayerMaskType mask;
2996 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
2997 {
2998 const Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
2999 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3000 mask &= player->getPlayerMask();
3001 }
3002
3003 //DEBUG_LOG(("getHumanPlayerMask(): mask was %4.4X\n", mask));
3004 return mask;
3005}
3006
3007//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3009//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3010void ScriptActions::doRevealMapAtWaypoint(const AsciiString& waypointName, Real radiusToReveal, const AsciiString& playerName)
3011{
3012 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
3013 if (!way) {
3014 return;
3015 }
3016
3017 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3018 PlayerMaskType playerMask;
3019 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3020 playerMask = player->getPlayerMask();
3021 else
3022 playerMask = getHumanPlayerMask();
3023
3024 Real positionX = way->getLocation()->x;
3025 Real positionY = way->getLocation()->y;
3026
3027 // A reveal script is a quick look. That way a Radar Jammer will still function correctly.
3028 ThePartitionManager->doShroudReveal(positionX, positionY, radiusToReveal, playerMask);
3029 ThePartitionManager->undoShroudReveal(positionX, positionY, radiusToReveal, playerMask);
3030}
3031
3032//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3034//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3035void ScriptActions::doShroudMapAtWaypoint(const AsciiString& waypointName, Real radiusToShroud, const AsciiString& playerName)
3036{
3037 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
3038 if (!way) {
3039 return;
3040 }
3041
3042 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3043 PlayerMaskType playerMask;
3044 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3045 playerMask = player->getPlayerMask();
3046 else
3047 playerMask = getHumanPlayerMask();
3048
3049 Real positionX = way->getLocation()->x;
3050 Real positionY = way->getLocation()->y;
3051
3052 // Likewise, this script does a dollop of shroud. Not permanent active shroud
3053 ThePartitionManager->doShroudCover(positionX, positionY, radiusToShroud, playerMask);
3054 ThePartitionManager->undoShroudCover(positionX, positionY, radiusToShroud, playerMask);
3055}
3056
3057//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3059//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3060void ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntire(const AsciiString& playerName)
3061{
3062 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntire() for player named '%s'\n", playerName.str()));
3063 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3064 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3065 {
3066 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntire() for player named '%ls' in position %d\n", player->getPlayerDisplayName().str(), player->getPlayerIndex()));
3067 ThePartitionManager->revealMapForPlayer( player->getPlayerIndex() );
3068 }
3069 else
3070 {
3071 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntire() - no player, so doing all human players\n"));
3072 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
3073 {
3074 Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
3075 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3076 {
3077 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntire() for player %d\n", i));
3078 ThePartitionManager->revealMapForPlayer( i );
3079 }
3080 }
3081 }
3082}
3083
3084void ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntirePermanently( Bool reveal, const AsciiString& playerName )
3085{
3086 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3087 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3088 {
3089 if( reveal )
3090 ThePartitionManager->revealMapForPlayerPermanently( player->getPlayerIndex() );
3091 else
3092 ThePartitionManager->undoRevealMapForPlayerPermanently( player->getPlayerIndex() );
3093 }
3094 else
3095 {
3096 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
3097 {
3098 Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
3099 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3100 {
3101 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doRevealMapEntirePermanently() for player %d\n", i));
3102 if( reveal )
3103 ThePartitionManager->revealMapForPlayerPermanently( i );
3104 else
3105 ThePartitionManager->undoRevealMapForPlayerPermanently( i );
3106 }
3107 }
3108 }
3109}
3110
3111//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3113//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3114void ScriptActions::doShroudMapEntire(const AsciiString& playerName)
3115{
3116 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3117 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3118 {
3119 ThePartitionManager->shroudMapForPlayer( player->getPlayerIndex() );
3120 }
3121 else
3122 {
3123 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
3124 {
3125 Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
3126 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3127 {
3128 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doShroudMapEntire() for player %d\n", i));
3129 ThePartitionManager->shroudMapForPlayer( i );
3130 }
3131 }
3132 }
3133}
3134
3135//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3137//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3138void ScriptActions::doTeamAvailableForRecruitment(const AsciiString& teamName, Bool availability)
3139{
3140 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
3141 if (!theTeam) {
3142 return;
3143 }
3144
3145 theTeam->setRecruitable(availability);
3146}

3148//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3150//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3151void ScriptActions::doCollectNearbyForTeam(const AsciiString& teamName)
3152{
3153 DEBUG_CRASH(("You would think this has been implemented, but you'd be wrong. (doCollectNearbyForTeam)"));
3154}
3155
3156//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3158//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3159void ScriptActions::doMergeTeamIntoTeam(const AsciiString& teamSrcName, const AsciiString& teamDestName)
3160{
3161 Team *teamSrc = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamSrcName);
3162 Team *teamDest = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamDestName);
3163 if (teamDest==NULL) {
3164 teamDest = TheTeamFactory->findTeam( teamDestName );
3165 }
3166 if (!teamSrc || !teamDest) {
3167 return;
3168 }
3169
3170// Bool done = FALSE;
3171
3172 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = teamSrc->iterate_TeamMemberList();
3173 Object *nextObj = iter.cur();
3174
3175 while (!iter.done()) {
3176 Object *obj = nextObj;
3177 if (!obj) {
3178 break;
3179 }
3180
3181 // this has to be done here, setting the team will screw up the iterator. total bummer dude. jkmcd
3182 nextObj = iter.cur();
3183 iter.advance();
3184 obj->setTeam(teamDest);
3185 updateTeamAndPlayerStuff(obj, NULL);
3186 }
3187
3188 if (nextObj) {
3189 nextObj->setTeam(teamDest);
3190 updateTeamAndPlayerStuff(nextObj, NULL);
3191 }
3192
3193 teamSrc->deleteTeam();
3194 teamDest->setActive(); // in case we just created him.
3195}
3196
3197//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3199//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3200void ScriptActions::doDisableInput()
3201{
3202#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
3203 if (!TheGlobalData->m_disableScriptedInputDisabling)
3204#endif
3205 {
3206 TheInGameUI->setInputEnabled(false);
3207 TheMouse->setVisibility(false);
3208 TheInGameUI->deselectAllDrawables();
3209 TheInGameUI->clearAttackMoveToMode();
3210 TheInGameUI->setWaypointMode( FALSE );
3211 TheControlBar->deleteBuildTooltipLayout();
3212 TheLookAtTranslator->resetModes();
3213 }
3214}
3215
3216//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3218//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3219void ScriptActions::doEnableInput()
3220{
3221 TheInGameUI->setInputEnabled(true);
3222 TheMouse->setVisibility(true);
3223}

3236//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3238//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3239void ScriptActions::doIdleAllPlayerUnits(const AsciiString& playerName)
3240{
3241 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3242 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3243 {
3244 player->setUnitsShouldIdleOrResume(true);
3245 }
3246 else
3247 {
3248 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
3249 {
3250 Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
3251 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3252 {
3253 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doIdleAllPlayerUnits() for player %d\n", i));
3254 player->setUnitsShouldIdleOrResume(true);
3255 }
3256 }
3257 }
3258}

3266 if (player && playerName.isNotEmpty())
3267 {
3268 player->setUnitsShouldIdleOrResume(false);
3269 }
3270 else
3271 {
3272 for (Int i=0; i<ThePlayerList->getPlayerCount(); ++i)
3273 {
3274 Player *player = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(i);
3275 if (player->getPlayerType() == PLAYER_HUMAN)
3276 {
3277 DEBUG_LOG(("ScriptActions::doResumeSupplyTruckingForIdleUnits() for player %d\n", i));
3278 player->setUnitsShouldIdleOrResume(false);
3279 }
3280 }
3281 }

3292//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3294//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3295void ScriptActions::doMusicTrackChange(const AsciiString& newTrackName, Bool fadeout, Bool fadein)
3296{
3297 // Stop playing the music
3298 if (fadeout) {
3299 TheAudio->removeAudioEvent(AHSV_StopTheMusicFade);
3300 } else {
3301 TheAudio->removeAudioEvent(AHSV_StopTheMusic);
3302 }
3303
3304 AudioEventRTS event(newTrackName);
3305 event.setShouldFade(fadein);
3306 event.setPlayerIndex(ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer()->getPlayerIndex());
3307 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&event);
3308
3309 TheScriptEngine->setCurrentTrackName(newTrackName);
3310}
3311
3312//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3314//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3315void ScriptActions::doTeamGarrisonSpecificBuilding(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& buildingName)
3316{
3317 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3318 if (!theTeam) {
3319 return;
3320 }
3321
3322 Object *theBuilding = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(buildingName);
3323 if (!theBuilding) {
3324 return;
3325 }
3326
3327 if( !theBuilding->getContain() )
3328 {
3329 DEBUG_CRASH( ("doTeamGarrisonSpecificBuilding script -- building doesn't have a container!" ) );
3330 return;
3331 }
3332 PlayerMaskType player = theBuilding->getContain()->getPlayerWhoEntered();
3333
3334 if (!(theBuilding->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE) &&
3335 (player == 0) || (player == theTeam->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask()))) {
3336 return;
3337 }
3338
3339 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
3340 if (!theGroup) {
3341 return;
3342 }
3343
3344 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
3345 theGroup->groupEnter(theBuilding, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3346}
3347
3348//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3350//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3351void ScriptActions::doExitSpecificBuilding(const AsciiString& buildingName)
3352{
3353 Object *theBuilding = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(buildingName);
3354 if (!theBuilding)
3355 {
3356 return;
3357 }
3358
3359 if (!theBuilding->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE))
3360 {
3361 return;
3362 }
3363
3364 AIUpdateInterface *ai = theBuilding->getAIUpdateInterface();
3365 if (ai)
3366 {
3367 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
3368 ai->aiEvacuate( FALSE, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
3369 return;
3370 }
3371
3372 ContainModuleInterface *contain = theBuilding->getContain();
3373 if (contain)
3374 {
3375 contain->removeAllContained( FALSE );
3376 }
3377}
3378
3379//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3381//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3382void ScriptActions::doTeamGarrisonNearestBuilding(const AsciiString& teamName)
3383{
3384 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3385 if (!theTeam) {
3386 return;
3387 }
3388
3389 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> diter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList();
3390 Object *leader = diter.cur();
3391 if (!leader) {
3392 return;
3393 }
3394
3395
3396 PartitionFilter *filters[16];
3397 Int count = 0;
3398
3399 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f1( MAKE_KINDOF_MASK( KINDOF_FS_INTERNET_CENTER ), KINDOFMASK_NONE );
3400 PartitionFilterGarrisonableByPlayer f2(theTeam->getControllingPlayer(), true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3401
3402 if( leader->isKindOf( KINDOF_MONEY_HACKER ) )
3403 {
3404 //If the leader is a hacker, then look for an internet center instead of a normal building!
3405 filters[ count++ ] = &f1;
3406 }
3407 else
3408 {
3409 //If the leader ISN'T a hacker, then look for standard fare garrisonable buildings (internet centers won't show up)!
3410 filters[ count++ ] = &f2;
3411 }
3412
3413 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(leader);
3414 filters[ count++ ] = &filterMapStatus;
3415
3416 filters[count++] = NULL;
3417
3418 ObjectIterator *iter = ThePartitionManager->iterateObjectsInRange(leader, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_3D, filters, ITER_SORTED_NEAR_TO_FAR);
3419 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold(iter);
3420
3421
3422 // here's what we do. Find out how many slots each building has open, and tell each unit individually to
3423 // garrison a specific building. We won't use the partition solver because we've already done most of the work
3424
3425 for (Object *theBuilding = iter->first(); theBuilding; theBuilding = iter->next()) {
3426 ContainModuleInterface *cmi = theBuilding->getContain();
3427 if (!cmi) {
3428 continue;
3429 }
3430
3431 Int slotsAvailable = cmi->getContainMax() - cmi->getContainCount();
3432 for (int i = 0; i < slotsAvailable; ) {
3433 Object *obj = diter.cur();
3434 if (diter.done() || !obj) {
3435 return;
3436 }
3437
3438 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
3439 if (ai && obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_INFANTRY) && !obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_NO_GARRISON)) {
3440 ai->aiEnter(theBuilding, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3441 ++i;
3442 }
3443 diter.advance();
3444 }
3445 }
3446}
3447
3448//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3450//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3451void ScriptActions::doTeamExitAllBuildings(const AsciiString& teamName)
3452{
3453 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3454 if (!theTeam) {
3455 return;
3456 }
3457
3458 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
3459 Object *obj = iter.cur();
3460 if (!obj) {
3461 continue;
3462 }
3463
3464 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
3465 if (!ai) {
3466 continue;
3467 }
3468
3469 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
3470 ai->aiExit(NULL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3471 }
3472}
3473
3474//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3476//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3477void ScriptActions::doUnitGarrisonSpecificBuilding(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& buildingName)
3478{
3479 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
3480 if (!theUnit) {
3481 return;
3482 }
3483
3484 Object *theBuilding = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(buildingName);
3485 if (!theBuilding) {
3486 return;
3487 }
3488
3489 ContainModuleInterface *contain = theBuilding->getContain();
3490 if( !contain )
3491 {
3492 DEBUG_CRASH(("doUnitGarrisonSpecificBuilding script -- building doesn't have a container" ));
3493 return;
3494 }
3495 PlayerMaskType player = theBuilding->getContain()->getPlayerWhoEntered();
3496
3497 if (!(theBuilding->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE) &&
3498 (player == 0) || (player == theUnit->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask()))) {
3499 return;
3500 }
3501 AIUpdateInterface *ai = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
3502 if (!ai) {
3503 return;
3504 }
3505
3506 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
3507 ai->aiEnter(theBuilding, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3508}
3509
3510//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3512//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3513void ScriptActions::doUnitGarrisonNearestBuilding(const AsciiString& unitName)
3514{
3515 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
3516 if (!theUnit) {
3517 return;
3518 }
3519
3520 AIUpdateInterface *ai = theUnit->getAIUpdateInterface();
3521 if (!ai) {
3522 return;
3523 }
3524
3525
3526 PartitionFilter *filters[16];
3527 Int count = 0;
3528
3529 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f1(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_STRUCTURE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
3530 filters[ count++ ] = &f1;
3531
3532 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(theUnit);
3533 filters[ count++ ] = &filterMapStatus;
3534
3535
3536 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f2( MAKE_KINDOF_MASK( KINDOF_FS_INTERNET_CENTER ), KINDOFMASK_NONE );
3537 PartitionFilterRejectByKindOf f3( MAKE_KINDOF_MASK( KINDOF_FS_INTERNET_CENTER ), KINDOFMASK_NONE );
3538
3539 if( theUnit->isKindOf( KINDOF_MONEY_HACKER ) )
3540 {
3541 //If the unit is a hacker, then look for an internet center instead of a normal building!
3542 filters[ count++ ] = &f2;
3543 }
3544 else
3545 {
3546 //If the unit ISN'T a hacker, then ignore internet centers!
3547 filters[ count++ ] = &f3;
3548 }
3549
3550 filters[count++] = NULL;
3551
3552 ObjectIterator *iter = ThePartitionManager->iterateObjectsInRange(theUnit, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_3D, filters, ITER_SORTED_NEAR_TO_FAR);
3553 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold(iter);
3554
3555 for (Object *theBuilding = iter->first(); theBuilding; theBuilding = iter->next())
3556 {
3557 ContainModuleInterface *contain = theBuilding->getContain();
3558 if( !contain )
3559 {
3560 DEBUG_CRASH( ("doUnitGarrisonNearestBuilding script -- building doesn't have a container.") );
3561 continue;
3562 }
3563 PlayerMaskType player = theBuilding->getContain()->getPlayerWhoEntered();
3564 if (!((player == 0) || (player == theUnit->getControllingPlayer()->getPlayerMask()))) {
3565 continue;
3566 }
3567
3568 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
3569 ai->aiEnter(theBuilding, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
3570 return;
3571 }
3572}
3573
3574//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3576//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3577void ScriptActions::doNamedEnableStealth( const AsciiString& unitName, Bool enabled )
3578{
3579 Object *self = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
3580 if( self )
3581 {
3582 self->setScriptStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNSTEALTHED, !enabled );
3583 }
3584}
3585
3586//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3588//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3589void ScriptActions::doTeamEnableStealth( const AsciiString& teamName, Bool enabled )
3590{
3591 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3592 if( !team )
3593 {
3594 return;
3595 }
3596
3597 for( DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
3598 {
3599 Object *obj = iter.cur();
3600 if( obj )
3601 {
3602 obj->setScriptStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_SCRIPT_UNSTEALTHED, !enabled );
3603 }
3604 }
3605}
3606
3607//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3609//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3610void ScriptActions::doNamedSetUnmanned( const AsciiString& unitName )
3611{
3612 Object *self = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
3613 if( self )
3614 {
3615 self->setDisabled( DISABLED_UNMANNED );
3616 TheGameLogic->deselectObject( self, PLAYERMASK_ALL, TRUE );
3617 // Convert it to the neutral team so it renders gray giving visual representation that it is unmanned.
3618 self->setTeam( ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer()->getDefaultTeam() );
3619 }
3620}
3621
3622//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3624//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3625void ScriptActions::doTeamSetUnmanned( const AsciiString& teamName )
3626{
3627 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3628 if( !team )
3629 {
3630 return;
3631 }
3632
3633 for( DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); )
3634 {
3635 Object *obj = iter.cur();
3636
3637 //Advance the iterator NOW because when we unman the object, the team gets nuked, and
3638 //the iterator stops after the first iteration!
3639 iter.advance();
3640 //*************
3641
3642 if( obj )
3643 {
3644 obj->setDisabled( DISABLED_UNMANNED );
3645 TheGameLogic->deselectObject( obj, PLAYERMASK_ALL, TRUE );
3646 // Convert it to the neutral team so it renders gray giving visual representation that it is unmanned.
3647 obj->setTeam( ThePlayerList->getNeutralPlayer()->getDefaultTeam() );
3648 }
3649 }
3650}
3651
3652//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3653void ScriptActions::doNamedSetBoobytrapped( const AsciiString& thingTemplateName, const AsciiString& unitName )
3654{
3655 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
3656 if( obj )
3657 {
3658 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thingTemplateName );
3659 if( thing )
3660 {
3661 Object *boobytrap = TheThingFactory->newObject( thing, obj->getTeam() );
3662 if( boobytrap )
3663 {
3664 static NameKeyType key_StickyBombUpdate = NAMEKEY( "StickyBombUpdate" );
3665 StickyBombUpdate *update = (StickyBombUpdate*)boobytrap->findUpdateModule( key_StickyBombUpdate );
3666 if( update )
3667 {
3668 //The charge gets positioned randomly on the outside of the perimeter of the victim.
3669 Coord3D pos;
3670 obj->getGeometryInfo().makeRandomOffsetOnPerimeter( pos );
3671
3672 //Get the angle and transform matrix from the obj... then transform the calculated
3673 //position
3674 const Matrix3D *transform = obj->getTransformMatrix();
3675 transform->Transform_Vector( *transform, *(Vector3*)(&pos), (Vector3*)(&pos) );
3676
3677 update->initStickyBomb( obj, NULL, &pos );
3678 }
3679 }
3680 }
3681 }
3682}
3683
3684//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3685void ScriptActions::doTeamSetBoobytrapped( const AsciiString& thingTemplateName, const AsciiString& teamName )
3686{
3687 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
3688 if( !team )
3689 {
3690 return;
3691 }
3692
3693 for( DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
3694 {
3695 Object *obj = iter.cur();
3696
3697 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thingTemplateName );
3698 if( thing )
3699 {
3700 Object *boobytrap = TheThingFactory->newObject( thing, obj->getTeam() );
3701 if( boobytrap )
3702 {
3703 static NameKeyType key_StickyBombUpdate = NAMEKEY( "StickyBombUpdate" );
3704 StickyBombUpdate *update = (StickyBombUpdate*)boobytrap->findUpdateModule( key_StickyBombUpdate );
3705 if( update )
3706 {
3707 //The charge gets positioned randomly on the outside of the perimeter of the victim.
3708 Coord3D pos;
3709 obj->getGeometryInfo().makeRandomOffsetOnPerimeter( pos );
3710
3711 //Get the angle and transform matrix from the obj... then transform the calculated
3712 //position
3713 const Matrix3D *transform = obj->getTransformMatrix();
3714 transform->Transform_Vector( *transform, *(Vector3*)(&pos), (Vector3*)(&pos) );
3715
3716 update->initStickyBomb( obj, NULL, &pos );
3717 }
3718 }
3719 }
3720 }
3721}
3722

3772//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3773void ScriptActions::doLetterBoxMode(Bool startLetterbox)
3774{
3775 if (startLetterbox)
3776 {
3777 HideControlBar(TRUE);
3778 TheDisplay->enableLetterBox(TRUE);
3779 }
3780 else
3781 {
3782 ShowControlBar(FALSE);
3783 TheDisplay->enableLetterBox(FALSE);
3784 }
3785}
3786
3787//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3789//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3790void ScriptActions::doBlackWhiteMode(Bool startBWMode, Int frames)
3791{
3792 if (startBWMode)
3793 {
3794 TheTacticalView->setViewFilterMode(FM_VIEW_BW_BLACK_AND_WHITE);
3795 TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_VIEW_BW_FILTER);
3796 TheTacticalView->setFadeParameters(frames, 1);
3797 }
3798 else
3799 {
3800 if ((TheTacticalView->getViewFilterType()) == FT_VIEW_BW_FILTER)
3801 { //mode already set, turn it off
3802 TheTacticalView->setFadeParameters(frames, -1);
3803 }
3804 }
3805}

3813{

3815 {
3816 doSkyBoxSet(1);
3817 }
3818 else
3819 {
3820 doSkyBoxSet(0);
3821 }
3822}

3852void ScriptActions::doMilitaryCaption(const AsciiString& briefing, Int duration)

3862//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3865void ScriptActions::doCameraSetAudibleDistance(Real audibleDistance)

3868}
3869
3870//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3872//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3873void ScriptActions::doSetStoppingDistance(const AsciiString& team, Real stoppingDistance)
3874{
3875 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
3876
3877 if (theTeam)
3878 {
3879 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
3880 {
3881 Object *obj = iter.cur();
3882
3883 AIUpdateInterface *aiUpdate = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
3884 if (!aiUpdate || !aiUpdate->getCurLocomotor()) {
3885 return;
3886 }
3887
3888 if (stoppingDistance >= 0.5f)
3889 {
3890 aiUpdate->getCurLocomotor()->setCloseEnoughDist(stoppingDistance);
3891 }
3892 }
3893 }
3894}
3895
3896//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3898//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3899void ScriptActions::doNamedSetHeld(const AsciiString& unit, Bool held)
3900{
3901 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
3902 if (theObj)
3903 {
3904 theObj->setDisabledUntil( DISABLED_HELD, held ? FOREVER : NEVER );
3905 }
3906}
3907
3908//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3910//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3911void ScriptActions::doNamedSetStoppingDistance(const AsciiString& unit, Real stoppingDistance)
3912{
3913 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
3914 if (theObj)
3915 {
3916 AIUpdateInterface *aiUpdate = theObj->getAIUpdateInterface();
3917 if (!aiUpdate || !aiUpdate->getCurLocomotor()) {
3918 return;
3919 }
3920
3921 if (stoppingDistance >= 0.5f)
3922 {
3923 aiUpdate->getCurLocomotor()->setCloseEnoughDist(stoppingDistance);
3924 }
3925 }
3926}
3927
3928//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3930//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3931void ScriptActions::doDisableSpecialPowerDisplay(void)
3932{
3933 TheInGameUI->setSuperweaponDisplayEnabledByScript(false);
3934}
3935
3936//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3938//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3939void ScriptActions::doEnableSpecialPowerDisplay(void)
3940{
3941 TheInGameUI->setSuperweaponDisplayEnabledByScript(true);
3942}
3943
3944//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3946//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3947void ScriptActions::doNamedHideSpecialPowerDisplay(const AsciiString& unit)
3948{
3949 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
3950 if (theObj)
3951 {
3952 TheInGameUI->hideObjectSuperweaponDisplayByScript(theObj);
3953 }
3954}
3955
3956//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3958//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3959void ScriptActions::doNamedShowSpecialPowerDisplay(const AsciiString& unit)
3960{
3961 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
3962 if (theObj)
3963 {
3964 TheInGameUI->showObjectSuperweaponDisplayByScript(theObj);
3965 }
3966}
3967
3968//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3970//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3971void ScriptActions::doAudioSetVolume(AudioAffect whichToAffect, Real newVolumeLevel)
3972{
3973 newVolumeLevel /= 100.0f;
3974 if (newVolumeLevel < 0.0f) {
3975 newVolumeLevel = 0.0f;
3976 } else if (newVolumeLevel > 1.0f) {
3977 newVolumeLevel = 1.0f;
3978 }
3979
3980 TheAudio->setVolume(newVolumeLevel, whichToAffect);
3981}
3982
3983//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3985//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3986void ScriptActions::doTransferTeamToPlayer(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& playerName)
3987{
3988
3989 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
3990 Player* playerDest = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
3991 if (!(theTeam && playerDest)) {
3992 return;
3993 }
3994
3995 theTeam->setControllingPlayer(playerDest);
3996
3997 // srj sez: ensure that all these guys get the upgrades that belong to the new player
3998 theTeam->iterateObjects(updateTeamAndPlayerStuff, NULL);
3999}
4000
4001//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4003//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4004void ScriptActions::doSetMoney(const AsciiString& playerName, Int money)
4005{
4006 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
4007
4008 if (!player) {
4009 return;
4010 }
4011
4012 Money *m = player->getMoney();
4013 if (!m)
4014 return;
4015
4016 m->withdraw(m->countMoney());
4017 m->deposit(money);
4018}
4019
4020//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4022//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4023void ScriptActions::doGiveMoney(const AsciiString& playerName, Int money)
4024{
4025 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
4026
4027 if (!player) {
4028 return;
4029 }
4030
4031 Money *m = player->getMoney();
4032 if (!m)
4033 return;
4034
4035 if (money < 0)
4036 m->withdraw(-money);
4037 else
4038 m->deposit(money);
4039}
4040

4045{
4046 TheInGameUI->addNamedTimer(counterName, TheGameText->fetch(counterText), false);
4047}

4053{

4055}

4061{
4062 TheInGameUI->addNamedTimer(timerName, TheGameText->fetch(timerText), true);
4063}

4069{

4071}

4089//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4091//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4092void ScriptActions::doNamedStopSpecialPowerCountdown(const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& specialPower, Bool stop)
4093{
4094 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4095 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4096 if (theObj && power)
4097 {
4098 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = theObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4099 if (mod)
4100 {
4101 mod->pauseCountdown(stop);
4102 }
4103 }
4104}
4105
4106//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4108//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4109void ScriptActions::doNamedSetSpecialPowerCountdown( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& specialPower, Int seconds )
4110{
4111 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4112 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4113 if (theObj && power)
4114 {
4115 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = theObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4116 if (mod)
4117 {
4118 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * seconds;
4119 mod->setReadyFrame(TheGameLogic->getFrame() + frames);
4120 }
4121 }
4122}
4123
4124//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4126//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4127void ScriptActions::doNamedAddSpecialPowerCountdown( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& specialPower, Int seconds )
4128{
4129 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4130 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4131 if (theObj && power)
4132 {
4133 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = theObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4134 if (mod)
4135 {
4136 Int frames = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND * seconds;
4137 mod->setReadyFrame(mod->getReadyFrame() + frames);
4138 }
4139 }
4140}
4141
4142//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4144//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4145void ScriptActions::doNamedFireSpecialPowerAtWaypoint( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& specialPower, const AsciiString& waypoint )
4146{
4147 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4148 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4149 if (theObj && power)
4150 {
4151 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = theObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4152 if (mod)
4153 {
4154 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypoint);
4155 if (!way) {
4156 return;
4157 }
4158 mod->doSpecialPowerAtLocation(way->getLocation(), INVALID_ANGLE, COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT );
4159 }
4160 }
4161}
4162
4163//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4165//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4166void ScriptActions::doSkirmishFireSpecialPowerAtMostCost( const AsciiString &player, const AsciiString& specialPower )
4167{
4168 Int enemyNdx;
4169 Player *enemyPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getSkirmishEnemyPlayer();
4170 if (enemyPlayer == NULL) return;
4171 enemyNdx = enemyPlayer->getPlayerIndex();
4172
4173 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4174 if (power==NULL)
4175 return;
4176 Real radius = 50.0f;
4177 if (power->getRadiusCursorRadius()>radius) {
4178 radius = power->getRadiusCursorRadius();
4179 }
4180
4181 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
4182
4183 Player *pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(player);
4184 if (pPlayer==NULL)
4185 return;
4186
4187
4188 for (it = pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it)
4189 {
4190 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
4191 {
4192 Team *team = iter.cur();
4193 if (!team)
4194 continue;
4195
4196 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
4197 {
4198 Object *pObj = iter.cur();
4199 if (!pObj)
4200 continue;
4201
4202 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = pObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4203 if (mod)
4204 {
4205 if( !mod->isReady() )
4206 continue;
4207
4208
4209 Coord3D location;
4210 Bool locationFound = FALSE;
4211
4212 locationFound = pPlayer->computeSuperweaponTarget(power, &location, enemyNdx, radius);
4213
4214 if( locationFound && power->getSpecialPowerType() == SPECIAL_SNEAK_ATTACK )
4215 {
4216 //We need to modify the location. We're already calculated the sweet spot, but we need to modify that
4217 //position if we can't place it in the current location.
4218 const ThingTemplate *sneakAttackTemplate = mod->getReferenceThingTemplate();
4219 if( sneakAttackTemplate )
4220 {
4221 locationFound = pPlayer->calcClosestConstructionZoneLocation( sneakAttackTemplate, &location );
4222 }
4223 }
4224
4225 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( locationFound, ("ScriptActions::doSkirmishFireSpecialPowerAtMostCost() could not find a valid (costly) location.") );
4226
4227 if( locationFound && location.lengthSqr() > 0.0f )
4228 {
4229 mod->doSpecialPowerAtLocation( &location, INVALID_ANGLE, COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT );
4230 }
4231 break;
4232 }
4233 }
4234 }
4235 }
4236}
4237
4238//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4240//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4241void ScriptActions::doNamedFireSpecialPowerAtNamed( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& specialPower, const AsciiString& target )
4242{
4243 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4244 Object *theTarget = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( target );
4245 const SpecialPowerTemplate *power = TheSpecialPowerStore->findSpecialPowerTemplate(specialPower);
4246 if (theObj && power && theTarget)
4247 {
4248 SpecialPowerModuleInterface *mod = theObj->getSpecialPowerModule(power);
4249 if (mod)
4250 {
4251 mod->doSpecialPowerAtObject(theTarget, COMMAND_FIRED_BY_SCRIPT );
4252 }
4253 }
4254}
4255
4256//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4257void ScriptActions::doNamedUseCommandButtonAbility( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& ability )
4258{
4259 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4260
4261 //Sanity check
4262 if( !theObj )
4263 {
4264 return;
4265 }
4266
4267 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( theObj->getCommandSetString() );
4268 if( commandSet )
4269 {
4270 for( Int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; i++ )
4271 {
4272 //Get the command button.
4273 const CommandButton *commandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(i);
4274
4275 if( commandButton )
4276 {
4277 if( !commandButton->getName().isEmpty() )
4278 {
4279 if( commandButton->getName() == ability )
4280 {
4281 theObj->doCommandButton( commandButton, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4282 }
4283 }
4284 }
4285 }
4286 }
4287}
4288
4289//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4290void ScriptActions::doNamedUseCommandButtonAbilityOnNamed( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& ability, const AsciiString& target )
4291{
4292 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4293 Object *theTarget = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( target );
4294
4295 //Sanity check
4296 if( !theObj || !theTarget )
4297 {
4298 return;
4299 }
4300
4301 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( theObj->getCommandSetString() );
4302 if( commandSet )
4303 {
4304 for( Int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; i++ )
4305 {
4306 //Get the command button.
4307 const CommandButton *commandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(i);
4308
4309 if( commandButton )
4310 {
4311 if( !commandButton->getName().isEmpty() )
4312 {
4313 if( commandButton->getName() == ability )
4314 {
4315 theObj->doCommandButtonAtObject( commandButton, theTarget, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4316 }
4317 }
4318 }
4319 }
4320 }
4321}
4322
4323//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4324void ScriptActions::doNamedUseCommandButtonAbilityAtWaypoint( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& ability, const AsciiString& waypoint )
4325{
4326 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4327 Waypoint *pWaypoint = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName( waypoint );
4328
4329 //Sanity check
4330 if( !theObj || !pWaypoint )
4331 {
4332 return;
4333 }
4334
4335 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( theObj->getCommandSetString() );
4336 if( commandSet )
4337 {
4338 for( Int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; i++ )
4339 {
4340 //Get the command button.
4341 const CommandButton *commandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(i);
4342
4343 if( commandButton )
4344 {
4345 if( !commandButton->getName().isEmpty() )
4346 {
4347 if( commandButton->getName() == ability )
4348 {
4349 theObj->doCommandButtonAtPosition( commandButton, pWaypoint->getLocation(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4350 }
4351 }
4352 }
4353 }
4354 }
4355}
4356
4357//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4358void ScriptActions::doNamedUseCommandButtonAbilityUsingWaypointPath( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& ability, const AsciiString& waypointPath )
4359{
4360 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4361 if( !theObj )
4362 {
4363 return;
4364 }
4365
4366 Waypoint *pWaypoint = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( theObj->getPosition(), waypointPath );
4367
4368 //Sanity check
4369 if( !pWaypoint )
4370 {
4371 return;
4372 }
4373
4374 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( theObj->getCommandSetString() );
4375 if( commandSet )
4376 {
4377 for( Int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; i++ )
4378 {
4379 //Get the command button.
4380 const CommandButton *commandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(i);
4381
4382 if( commandButton )
4383 {
4384 if( !commandButton->getName().isEmpty() )
4385 {
4386 if( commandButton->getName() == ability )
4387 {
4388 theObj->doCommandButtonUsingWaypoints( commandButton, pWaypoint, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4389 }
4390 }
4391 }
4392 }
4393 }
4394}
4395
4396//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4397void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonAbility( const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& ability )
4398{
4399 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
4400 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
4401 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
4402 if( !theTeam )
4403 {
4404 return;
4405 }
4406
4407 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( ability );
4408 if( !commandButton )
4409 {
4410 return;
4411 }
4412
4413
4414 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4415 if( !theGroup )
4416 {
4417 return;
4418 }
4419
4420 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup( theGroup );
4421
4422 theGroup->groupDoCommandButton( commandButton, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4423}
4424
4425//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4426void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonAbilityOnNamed( const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& ability, const AsciiString& target )
4427{
4428 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
4429 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
4430 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
4431 if( !theTeam )
4432 {
4433 return;
4434 }
4435
4436 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( target );
4437 if( !theObj )
4438 {
4439 return;
4440 }
4441
4442 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( ability );
4443 if( !commandButton )
4444 {
4445 return;
4446 }
4447
4448
4449 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4450 if( !theGroup )
4451 {
4452 return;
4453 }
4454
4455 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup( theGroup );
4456
4457 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject( commandButton, theObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4458}
4459
4460//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4461void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonAbilityAtWaypoint( const AsciiString& team, const AsciiString& ability, const AsciiString& waypoint )
4462{
4463 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( team );
4464 // The team is the team based on the name, and the calling team (if any) and the team that
4465 // triggered the condition. jba. :)
4466 if( !theTeam )
4467 {
4468 return;
4469 }
4470
4471 Waypoint *pWaypoint = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName( waypoint );
4472 if( !pWaypoint )
4473 {
4474 return;
4475 }
4476
4477 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( ability );
4478 if( !commandButton )
4479 {
4480 return;
4481 }
4482
4483
4484 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4485 if( !theGroup )
4486 {
4487 return;
4488 }
4489
4490 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup( theGroup );
4491
4492 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtPosition( commandButton, pWaypoint->getLocation(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
4493}
