4508//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4510//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4511void ScriptActions::doCameraTetherNamed(const AsciiString& unit, Bool snapToUnit, Real play)
4512{
4513 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4514 if (theObj)
4515 {
4516 TheTacticalView->setCameraLock(theObj->getID());
4517 if (snapToUnit)
4518 TheTacticalView->snapToCameraLock();
4519
4520 TheTacticalView->setSnapMode( View::LOCK_TETHER, play );
4521 }
4522}
4523
4524//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4526//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4527void ScriptActions::doCameraStopTetherNamed(void)
4528{
4529 TheTacticalView->setCameraLock(INVALID_ID);
4530}
4531
4532//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4534//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4535void ScriptActions::doCameraSetDefault(Real pitch, Real angle, Real maxHeight)
4536{
4537 TheTacticalView->setDefaultView(pitch, angle, maxHeight);
4538}
4539
4540//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4542//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4543void ScriptActions::doNamedStop(const AsciiString& unitName)
4544{
4545 Object *theObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
4546 if (!theObj) {
4547 return;
4548 }
4549
4550 AIUpdateInterface *ai = theObj->getAIUpdateInterface();
4551 if (!ai) {
4552 return;
4553 }
4554
4555 ai->aiIdle(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4556}
4557
4558//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4560//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4561void ScriptActions::doTeamStop(const AsciiString& teamName, Bool shouldDisband)
4562{
4563 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4564 if (!theTeam) {
4565 return;
4566 }
4567
4568 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4569 if (!theGroup) {
4570 return;
4571 }
4572
4573 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
4574 theGroup->groupIdle(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4575
4576 if (shouldDisband) {
4577 Team *playerDefaultTeam = theTeam->getControllingPlayer()->getDefaultTeam();
4578
4579 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
4580 Object *obj = iter.cur();
4581
4582 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
4583 if (!ai) {
4584 continue;
4585 }
4586
4587 ai->setIsRecruitable(TRUE);
4588 }
4589
4590 doMergeTeamIntoTeam(teamName, playerDefaultTeam->getName());
4591 }
4592}
4593
4594//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4596//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4597void ScriptActions::doTeamSetOverrideRelationToTeam(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& otherTeam, Int relation)
4598{
4599 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
4600 Team *theOtherTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( otherTeam );
4601 if (theTeam && theOtherTeam) {
4602 theTeam->setOverrideTeamRelationship(theOtherTeam->getID(), (Relationship)relation);
4603 }
4604}
4605
4606//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4608//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4609void ScriptActions::doTeamRemoveOverrideRelationToTeam(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& otherTeam)
4610{
4611 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
4612 Team *theOtherTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( otherTeam );
4613 if (theTeam && theOtherTeam) {
4614 theTeam->removeOverrideTeamRelationship(theOtherTeam->getID());
4615 }
4616}
4617
4618//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4620//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4621void ScriptActions::doPlayerSetOverrideRelationToTeam(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& otherTeam, Int relation)
4622{
4623 Player *thePlayer = ThePlayerList->findPlayerWithNameKey(NAMEKEY(playerName));
4624 Team *theOtherTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( otherTeam );
4625 if (thePlayer && theOtherTeam) {
4626 thePlayer->setTeamRelationship(theOtherTeam, (Relationship)relation);
4627 }
4628}
4629
4630//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4632//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4633void ScriptActions::doPlayerRemoveOverrideRelationToTeam(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& otherTeam)
4634{
4635 Player *thePlayer = ThePlayerList->findPlayerWithNameKey(NAMEKEY(playerName));
4636 Team *theOtherTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( otherTeam );
4637 if (thePlayer && theOtherTeam) {
4638 thePlayer->removeTeamRelationship(theOtherTeam);
4639 }
4640}
4641
4642//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4644//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4645void ScriptActions::doTeamSetOverrideRelationToPlayer(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& otherPlayer, Int relation)
4646{
4647 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
4648 Player *theOtherPlayer = ThePlayerList->findPlayerWithNameKey(NAMEKEY(otherPlayer));
4649 if (theTeam && theOtherPlayer) {
4650 theTeam->setOverridePlayerRelationship(theOtherPlayer->getPlayerIndex(), (Relationship)relation);
4651 }
4652}
4653
4654//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4656//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4657void ScriptActions::doTeamRemoveOverrideRelationToPlayer(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& otherPlayer)
4658{
4659 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
4660 Player *theOtherPlayer = ThePlayerList->findPlayerWithNameKey(NAMEKEY(otherPlayer));
4661 if (theTeam && theOtherPlayer) {
4662 theTeam->removeOverridePlayerRelationship(theOtherPlayer->getPlayerIndex());
4663 }
4664}
4665
4666//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4668//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4669void ScriptActions::doTeamRemoveAllOverrideRelations(const AsciiString& teamName)
4670{
4671 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
4672 if (theTeam) {
4673 // invalid ID is OK -- it removes all relationships
4674 theTeam->removeOverrideTeamRelationship( NULL );
4675 theTeam->removeOverridePlayerRelationship( NULL );
4676 }
4677}
4678//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4680//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4681void ScriptActions::doUnitStartSequentialScript(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& scriptName, Int loopVal)
4682{
4683 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
4684 if (!obj) {
4685 return;
4686 }
4687
4688 Script *script = const_cast<Script*>(TheScriptEngine->findScriptByName(scriptName));
4689 if (!script) {
4690 return;
4691 }
4692
4693 SequentialScript* seqScript = newInstance(SequentialScript);
4694 seqScript->m_objectID = obj->getID();
4695 seqScript->m_scriptToExecuteSequentially = script;
4696 seqScript->m_timesToLoop = loopVal;
4697
4698 TheScriptEngine->appendSequentialScript(seqScript);
4699
4700 seqScript->deleteInstance();
4701}
4702
4703//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4705//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4706void ScriptActions::doUnitStopSequentialScript(const AsciiString& unitName)
4707{
4708 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
4709 if (!obj) {
4710 return;
4711 }
4712
4713 TheScriptEngine->removeAllSequentialScripts(obj);
4714}
4715
4716//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4718//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4722//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4723void ScriptActions::doNamedFireWeaponFollowingWaypointPath( const AsciiString& unit, const AsciiString& waypointPath )
4724{
4725 //Get the unit... if it fails, abort.
4726 Object *theUnit = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unit );
4727 if( !theUnit )
4728 {
4729 return;
4730 }
4731
4732 Coord3D pos = *theUnit->getPosition();
4733
4734
4735 //Find the closest waypoint on the path.
4736 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getClosestWaypointOnPath( &pos, waypointPath );
4737 if( !way )
4738 {
4739 return;
4740 }
4741 //We have to do special checking to make sure our unit even has a waypoint following capable weapon.
4742 Weapon *weapon = theUnit->findWaypointFollowingCapableWeapon();
4743 if( !weapon )
4744 {
4745 return;
4746 }
4747
4748 Object *projectile = weapon->forceFireWeapon( theUnit, &pos );
4749 if( projectile )
4750 {
4751 //Get the AIUpdateInterface... if it fails, abort.
4752 AIUpdateInterface* aiUpdate = projectile->getAIUpdateInterface();
4753 if( !aiUpdate )
4754 {
4755 return;
4756 }
4757 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(TheTerrainLogic->isPurposeOfPath(way, waypointPath), ("***Wrong waypoint purpose. Make jba fix this.\n"));
4758
4759 projectile->leaveGroup();
4760 aiUpdate->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
4761 aiUpdate->aiFollowWaypointPath(way, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4762 }
4763}
4764
4765//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4767//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4768void ScriptActions::doTeamStartSequentialScript(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& scriptName, Int loopVal)
4769{
4770 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4771 if (!team) {
4772 return;
4773 }
4774
4775 Script *script = const_cast<Script*>(TheScriptEngine->findScriptByName(scriptName));
4776 if (!script) {
4777 return;
4778 }
4779
4780 // Idle the team so the seq script will start executing. jba.
4781 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4782 if (!theGroup) {
4783 return;
4784 }
4785
4786 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
4787 theGroup->groupIdle(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4788
4789
4790 SequentialScript* seqScript = newInstance(SequentialScript);
4791 seqScript->m_teamToExecOn = team;
4792 seqScript->m_scriptToExecuteSequentially = script;
4793 seqScript->m_timesToLoop = loopVal;
4794
4795 TheScriptEngine->appendSequentialScript(seqScript);
4796
4797 seqScript->deleteInstance();
4798}
4799
4800//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4802//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4803void ScriptActions::doTeamStopSequentialScript(const AsciiString& teamName)
4804{
4805 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4806 if (!team) {
4807 return;
4808 }
4809
4810 TheScriptEngine->removeAllSequentialScripts(team);
4811}
4812
4813
4814//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4816//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4817void ScriptActions::doUnitGuardForFramecount(const AsciiString& unitName, Int framecount)
4818{
4819 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
4820 if (!obj) {
4821 return;
4822 }
4823
4824 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
4825 if (!ai) {
4826 return;
4827 }
4828
4829 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
4830 ai->chooseLocomotorSet(LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL);
4831 ai->aiGuardPosition(&pos, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4832 TheScriptEngine->setSequentialTimer(obj, framecount);
4833}
4834
4835//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4837//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4838void ScriptActions::doUnitIdleForFramecount(const AsciiString& unitName, Int framecount)
4839{
4840 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
4841 if (!obj) {
4842 return;
4843 }
4844
4845 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
4846 if (!ai) {
4847 return;
4848 }
4849
4850 ai->aiIdle(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4851 TheScriptEngine->setSequentialTimer(obj, framecount);
4852}
4853
4854//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4856//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4857void ScriptActions::doTeamGuardForFramecount(const AsciiString& teamName, Int framecount)
4858{
4859 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4860 if (!theTeam) {
4861 return;
4862 }
4863
4864 // Have all the members of the team guard at their current pos.
4865 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = theTeam->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
4866 {
4867 Object *obj = iter.cur();
4868 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
4869 if (!ai) {
4870 continue;
4871 }
4872 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
4873 ai->aiGuardPosition(&pos, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4874 }
4875 TheScriptEngine->setSequentialTimer(theTeam, framecount);
4876}
4877
4878//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4880//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4881void ScriptActions::doTeamIdleForFramecount(const AsciiString& teamName, Int framecount)
4882{
4883 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4884 if (!theTeam) {
4885 return;
4886 }
4887
4888 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
4889 if (!theGroup) {
4890 return;
4891 }
4892
4893 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
4894 Coord3D center;
4895 theGroup->getCenter(&center);
4896
4897 theGroup->groupIdle(CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
4898 TheScriptEngine->setSequentialTimer(theTeam, framecount);
4899}
4900
4901//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4903//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4904void ScriptActions::doWaterChangeHeight(const AsciiString& waterName, Real newHeight)
4905{
4906 const WaterHandle *water = TheTerrainLogic->getWaterHandleByName(waterName);
4907 if (!water) {
4908 return;
4909 }
4910
4911 TheTerrainLogic->setWaterHeight(water, newHeight, 999999.9f, TRUE );
4912}
4913
4914//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4916//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4917void ScriptActions::doWaterChangeHeightOverTime( const AsciiString& waterName, Real newHeight, Real time, Real damage )
4918{
4919 const WaterHandle *water = TheTerrainLogic->getWaterHandleByName( waterName );
4920 if( water )
4921 {
4922 TheTerrainLogic->changeWaterHeightOverTime( water, newHeight, time, damage );
4923 }
4924}
4925
4926//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4928//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4929void ScriptActions::doBorderSwitch(Int borderToUse)
4930{
4931 /*
4932 * The observer player always has to have the map completely revealed for him.
4933 * Border switching doesn't play nice with the permanent map reveal so for the
4934 * observer player we need to undo the old permanent reveal, switch map borders,
4935 * and re-reveal the map. BGC
4936 */
4937 Int observerPlayerIndex = -1;
4938 if (ThePlayerList != NULL)
4939 {
4940 Player *observer = ThePlayerList->findPlayerWithNameKey(TheNameKeyGenerator->nameToKey("ReplayObserver"));
4941
4942 if (observer != NULL) {
4943 observerPlayerIndex = observer->getPlayerIndex();
4944 }
4945 }
4946
4947 if (observerPlayerIndex != -1)
4948 {
4949 ThePartitionManager->undoRevealMapForPlayerPermanently( observerPlayerIndex );
4950 }
4951
4952 TheTerrainLogic->setActiveBoundary(borderToUse);
4953
4954 if (observerPlayerIndex != -1)
4955 {
4956 ThePartitionManager->revealMapForPlayerPermanently( observerPlayerIndex );
4957 }
4958
4959 ThePartitionManager->refreshShroudForLocalPlayer();
4960}
4961
4962//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4964//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4965void ScriptActions::doForceObjectSelection(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& objectType, Bool centerInView, const AsciiString& audioToPlay)
4966{
4967 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
4968
4969 if (!team) {
4970 return;
4971 }
4972
4973 Object *bestGuess = NULL;
4974
4975 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
4976 Object *obj = iter.cur();
4977 if (!obj) {
4978 continue;
4979 }
4980
4981 if (obj->getTemplate() && obj->getTemplate()->getName() == objectType) {
4982 if (bestGuess == NULL || obj->getID() < bestGuess->getID()) { // lower ID means its newer
4983 bestGuess = obj;
4984 }
4985 }
4986 }
4987
4988 if (!(bestGuess && bestGuess->getDrawable())) {
4989 return;
4990 }
4991
4992 TheInGameUI->deselectAllDrawables();
4993 TheInGameUI->selectDrawable(bestGuess->getDrawable());
4994 // play the sound
4995 AudioEventRTS audioEvent(audioToPlay);
4996 audioEvent.setPlayerIndex(ThePlayerList->getLocalPlayer()->getPlayerIndex());
4997 TheAudio->addAudioEvent(&audioEvent);
4998
4999 if (centerInView) {
5000 Coord3D pos = *bestGuess->getPosition();
5001 TheTacticalView->moveCameraTo(&pos, 0, 0, FALSE, 0.0f, 0.0f);
5002 }
5003}
5004
5005void* __cdecl killTheObject( Object *obj, void* userObj )
5006{
5007 userObj;
5008 if (obj)
5009 obj->kill();
5010 return NULL;
5011}
5012
5013//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5015//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5016void ScriptActions::doDestroyAllContained(const AsciiString& unitName, Int damageType )
5017{
5018 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
5019 if (!obj) {
5020 return;
5021 }
5022
5023 ContainModuleInterface *cmi = obj->getContain();
5024 if( !cmi || cmi->getContainCount() == 0 )
5025 {
5026 return;
5027 }
5028
5029 cmi->iterateContained((ContainIterateFunc)killTheObject, NULL, false);
5030}
5031

5035void ScriptActions::doRadarForceEnable(void)
5036{
5037 TheRadar->forceOn(true);
5038}
5039
5040//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5042//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5043void ScriptActions::doRadarRevertNormal(void)
5044{
5045 TheRadar->forceOn(false);
5046}

5048//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5050//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5051void ScriptActions::doScreenShake( UnsignedInt intensity )
5052{
5053 Coord3D pos;
5054 TheTacticalView->getPosition( &pos );
5055 TheTacticalView->shake( &pos, (View::CameraShakeType)intensity );
5056}
5057
5058//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5060//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5061void ScriptActions::doModifyBuildableStatus( const AsciiString& objectType, Int buildableStatus )
5062{
5063 const ThingTemplate *templ = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(objectType);
5064 if (!templ)
5065 {
5066 return;
5067 }
5068
5069 TheGameLogic->setBuildableStatusOverride(templ, (BuildableStatus) buildableStatus);
5070}
5071
5072//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5073static CaveInterface* findCave(Object* obj)
5074{
5075 for (BehaviorModule** i = obj->getBehaviorModules(); *i; ++i)
5076 {
5077 CaveInterface* c = (*i)->getCaveInterface();
5078 if (c != NULL)
5079 return c;
5080 }
5081 return NULL;
5082}
5083
5084//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5086//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5087void ScriptActions::doSetCaveIndex( const AsciiString& caveName, Int caveIndex )
5088{
5089 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(caveName);
5090 if (!obj)
5091 {
5092 return;
5093 }
5094
5095 CaveInterface *caveModule = findCave(obj);
5096 if( caveModule == NULL )
5097 return;
5098
5099 caveModule->tryToSetCaveIndex( caveIndex );
5100}
5101
5102//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5104//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5105void ScriptActions::doSetWarehouseValue( const AsciiString& warehouseName, Int cashValue )
5106{
5107 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(warehouseName);
5108 if (!obj)
5109 {
5110 return;
5111 }
5112
5113 static const NameKeyType warehouseModuleKey = TheNameKeyGenerator->nameToKey( "SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate" );
5114 SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate *warehouseModule = (SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate *)obj->findUpdateModule( warehouseModuleKey );
5115 if( warehouseModule == NULL )
5116 return;
5117
5118 warehouseModule->setCashValue( cashValue );
5119}

5127}

5149//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5151//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

5155}
5156
5157//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5159//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5160void ScriptActions::doMoveUnitTowardsNearest( const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& objectType, AsciiString triggerName)
5161{
5162 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
5163 if (!obj)
5164 {
5165 return;
5166 }
5167
5168 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
5169 if (!ai)
5170 {
5171 return;
5172 }
5173
5174 PolygonTrigger *trig = TheScriptEngine->getQualifiedTriggerAreaByName(triggerName);
5175 if (!trig)
5176 {
5177 return;
5178 }
5179
5180 Object *bestObj = NULL;
5181
5182 const ThingTemplate *templ = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( objectType, FALSE );
5183 if( templ )
5184 {
5185 PartitionFilterThing thingsToAccept(templ, true);
5186 PartitionFilterPolygonTrigger acceptWithin(trig);
5187 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(obj);
5188
5189 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &thingsToAccept, &acceptWithin, &filterMapStatus, NULL };
5190
5191 bestObj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject( obj->getPosition(), REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters );
5192 if( !bestObj )
5193 {
5194 return;
5195 }
5196 }
5197 else
5198 {
5199 ObjectTypes *objectTypes = TheScriptEngine->getObjectTypes( objectType );
5200 if( objectTypes )
5201 {
5202 PartitionFilterPolygonTrigger acceptWithin( trig );
5203 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus( obj );
5204
5205 Coord3D pos = *obj->getPosition();
5206 Real closestDist;
5207 Real dist;
5208
5209 for( Int typeIndex = 0; typeIndex < objectTypes->getListSize(); typeIndex++ )
5210 {
5211 AsciiString thisTypeName = objectTypes->getNthInList( typeIndex );
5212 const ThingTemplate *thisType = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thisTypeName );
5213 if( thisType )
5214 {
5215 PartitionFilterThing f2( thisType, true );
5216 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f2, &acceptWithin, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5217
5218 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject( &pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters, &dist );
5219 if( obj )
5220 {
5221 if( !bestObj || dist < closestDist )
5222 {
5223 bestObj = obj;
5224 closestDist = dist;
5225 }
5226 }
5227 }
5228 }
5229 }
5230 }
5231
5232 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
5233 ai->aiMoveToObject( bestObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5234}
5235
5236//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5238//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5239void ScriptActions::doMoveTeamTowardsNearest( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& objectType, AsciiString triggerName)
5240{
5241 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5242 if (!team)
5243 {
5244 return;
5245 }
5246
5247 PolygonTrigger *trig = TheScriptEngine->getQualifiedTriggerAreaByName(triggerName);
5248 if (!trig)
5249 {
5250 return;
5251 }
5252
5253 //Get the first object (to use in the partition filter checks).
5254 Object *teamObj = NULL;
5255 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
5256 {
5257 teamObj = iter.cur();
5258 if( teamObj )
5259 {
5260 AIUpdateInterface *ai = teamObj->getAIUpdateInterface();
5261 if( ai )
5262 {
5263 break;
5264 }
5265 }
5266 }
5267 if( !teamObj )
5268 {
5269 return;
5270 }
5271
5272 Coord3D teamPos = *team->getEstimateTeamPosition();
5273 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus( teamObj );
5274 PartitionFilterPolygonTrigger acceptWithin( trig );
5275 Object *bestObj = NULL;
5276
5277 const ThingTemplate *templ = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( objectType, FALSE );
5278 if( templ )
5279 {
5280 //Find the closest specified template.
5281 PartitionFilterThing thingsToAccept( templ, true );
5282 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &thingsToAccept, &acceptWithin, &filterMapStatus, NULL };
5283 bestObj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject( &teamPos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters );
5284 if (!bestObj)
5285 {
5286 return;
5287 }
5288 }
5289 else
5290 {
5291 //Find the closest object within the object template list.
5292 ObjectTypes *objectTypes = TheScriptEngine->getObjectTypes( objectType );
5293 if( objectTypes )
5294 {
5295 Real closestDist;
5296 Real dist;
5297 for( Int typeIndex = 0; typeIndex < objectTypes->getListSize(); typeIndex++ )
5298 {
5299 AsciiString thisTypeName = objectTypes->getNthInList( typeIndex );
5300 const ThingTemplate *thisType = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thisTypeName );
5301 if( thisType )
5302 {
5303 PartitionFilterThing thingToAccept( thisType, true );
5304 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &thingToAccept, &acceptWithin, &filterMapStatus, NULL };
5305
5306 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject( &teamPos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters, &dist );
5307 if( obj )
5308 {
5309 if( !bestObj || dist < closestDist )
5310 {
5311 bestObj = obj;
5312 closestDist = dist;
5313 }
5314 }
5315 }
5316 }
5317 }
5318 }
5319 for( iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
5320 {
5321 Object *obj = iter.cur();
5322 if( !obj )
5323 {
5324 return;
5325 }
5326 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAI();
5327 if( !ai )
5328 {
5329 return;
5330 }
5331 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
5332 ai->aiMoveToObject( bestObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5333 }
5334}
5335
5336//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5338//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5339void ScriptActions::doUnitReceiveUpgrade( const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& upgradeName )
5340{
5341 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed(unitName);
5342 if (!obj) {
5343 return;
5344 }
5345
5346 const UpgradeTemplate *templ = TheUpgradeCenter->findUpgrade(upgradeName);
5347 if (!templ) {
5348 return;
5349 }
5350
5351 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(obj->affectedByUpgrade(templ), ("Design bug: Unit '%s' was given upgrade '%s', but he is unaffected.", unitName.str(), upgradeName.str()));
5352
5353 obj->giveUpgrade(templ);
5354}
5355
5356//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5358//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5359void ScriptActions::doSkirmishAttackNearestGroupWithValue( const AsciiString& teamName, Int comparison, Int value )
5360{
5361 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5362 if (!team) {
5363 return;
5364 }
5365
5366 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5367 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5368
5369 Player *player = team->getControllingPlayer();
5370
5371 if (!player)
5372 return;
5373
5374 Coord3D loc;
5375 Coord3D groupLoc;
5376 theGroup->getCenter(&groupLoc);
5377 if (comparison == Parameter::GREATER_EQUAL || comparison == Parameter::GREATER) {
5378 ThePartitionManager->getNearestGroupWithValue(player->getPlayerIndex(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, VOT_CashValue,
5379 &groupLoc, value, true, &loc);
5380 }
5381
5382 theGroup->groupAttackMoveToPosition( &loc, NO_MAX_SHOTS_LIMIT, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
5383}
5384
5385//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5387//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5388void ScriptActions::doSkirmishCommandButtonOnMostValuable( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& ability, Real range, Bool allTeamMembers)
5389{
5390 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5391 if (!team) {
5392 return;
5393 }
5394
5395 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5396 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5397
5398 Player *player = team->getControllingPlayer();
5399 if (!player)
5400 return;
5401
5402 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( ability );
5403 if( !commandButton ) {
5404 return;
5405 }
5406
5407 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5408 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5409 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5410 } else {
5411 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5412 }
5413
5414 if ( !srcObj ) {
5415 return;
5416 }
5417
5418 Coord3D pos;
5419 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5420
5421 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5422 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f2(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5423 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5424
5425 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5426 // @todo: Should we add the group's radius to the range? Seems like a possibility.
5427 SimpleObjectIterator *iter = ThePartitionManager->iterateObjectsInRange(&pos, range, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters, ITER_SORTED_EXPENSIVE_TO_CHEAP);
5428 MemoryPoolObjectHolder hold(iter);
5429
5430 if (iter && iter->first()) {
5431 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, iter->first(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5432 }
5433}
5434
5435//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5437//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5438void ScriptActions::doTeamSpinForFramecount( const AsciiString& teamName, Int waitForFrames )
5439{
5440 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5441 if (!team) {
5442 return;
5443 }
5444
5445 TheScriptEngine->setSequentialTimer(team, waitForFrames);
5446}
5447
5448//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5450//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5451void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNamed( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility, const AsciiString& unitName )
5452{
5453 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5454 if (!team) {
5455 return;
5456 }
5457
5458 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5459 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5460
5461 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5462 if(!commandButton) {
5463 return;
5464 }
5465
5466 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5467 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5468 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5469 } else {
5470 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5471 }
5472
5473 if (!srcObj) {
5474 return;
5475 }
5476
5477 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
5478 if (!obj) {
5479 return;
5480 }
5481
5482 if (commandButton->isValidToUseOn(srcObj, obj, NULL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT)) {
5483 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5484 }
5485}
5486
5487//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5489//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5490void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestEnemy( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility )
5491{
5492 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5493 if (!team) {
5494 return;
5495 }
5496
5497 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5498 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5499
5500 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5501 if(!commandButton) {
5502 return;
5503 }
5504
5505 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5506 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5507 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5508 } else {
5509 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5510 }
5511
5512 if (!srcObj) {
5513 return;
5514 }
5515
5516 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5517 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f2(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5518 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5519
5520 Coord3D pos;
5521 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5522
5523 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5524 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5525 if (!obj) {
5526 return;
5527 }
5528
5529 // already been checked for validity
5530 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5531}
5532
5533//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5535//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5536void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestGarrisonedBuilding( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility )
5537{
5538 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5539 if (!team) {
5540 return;
5541 }
5542
5543 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5544 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5545
5546 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5547 if(!commandButton) {
5548 return;
5549 }
5550
5551 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5552 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5553 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5554 } else {
5555 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5556 }
5557
5558 if (!srcObj) {
5559 return;
5560 }
5561
5562 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5563 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f2(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_STRUCTURE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
5564 PartitionFilterGarrisonable f3(true);
5565 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f4(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5566 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5567
5568 Coord3D pos;
5569 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5570
5571 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &f4, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5572 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5573 if (!obj) {
5574 return;
5575 }
5576
5577 // already been checked for validity
5578 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5579}
5580
5581//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5583//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5584void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestKindof( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility, Int kindofBit )
5585{
5586 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5587 if (!team) {
5588 return;
5589 }
5590
5591 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5592 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5593
5594 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5595 if (!commandButton) {
5596 return;
5597 }
5598
5599 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5600 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5601 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5602 } else {
5603 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5604 }
5605
5606 if (!srcObj) {
5607 return;
5608 }
5609
5610 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5611 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f2(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(kindofBit), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
5612 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f3(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5613 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5614
5615 Coord3D pos;
5616 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5617
5618 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5619 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5620 if (!obj) {
5621 return;
5622 }
5623
5624 // already been checked for validity
5625 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5626}
5627
5628//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5630//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5631void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestBuilding( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility )
5632{
5633 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5634 if (!team) {
5635 return;
5636 }
5637
5638 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5639 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5640
5641 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5642 if (!commandButton) {
5643 return;
5644 }
5645
5646 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5647 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5648 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5649 } else {
5650 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5651 }
5652
5653 if (!srcObj) {
5654 return;
5655 }
5656
5657 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5658 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f2(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_STRUCTURE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
5659 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f3(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5660 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5661
5662 Coord3D pos;
5663 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5664
5665 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5666 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5667 if (!obj) {
5668 return;
5669 }
5670
5671 // already been checked for validity
5672 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5673}
5674
5675//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5677//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5678void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestBuildingClass( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility, Int kindofBit )
5679{
5680 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5681 if (!team) {
5682 return;
5683 }
5684
5685 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5686 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5687
5688 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5689 if (!commandButton) {
5690 return;
5691 }
5692
5693 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5694 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5695 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5696 } else {
5697 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5698 }
5699
5700 if (!srcObj) {
5701 return;
5702 }
5703
5704 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES, true);
5705 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f2(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_STRUCTURE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
5706 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f3(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(kindofBit), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
5707 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f4(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5708 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5709
5710 Coord3D pos;
5711 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5712
5713 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &f4, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5714 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5715 if (!obj) {
5716 return;
5717 }
5718
5719 // already been checked for validity
5720 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5721}
5722
5723//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5725//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5726void ScriptActions::doTeamUseCommandButtonOnNearestObjectType( const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility, const AsciiString& objectType )
5727{
5728 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5729 if (!team) {
5730 return;
5731 }
5732
5733 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5734 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5735
5736 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5737 if (!commandButton) {
5738 return;
5739 }
5740
5741 Object *srcObj = NULL;
5742 if (commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()) {
5743 srcObj = theGroup->getSpecialPowerSourceObject(commandButton->getSpecialPowerTemplate()->getID());
5744 } else {
5745 srcObj = theGroup->getCommandButtonSourceObject(commandButton->getCommandType());
5746 }
5747
5748 if (!srcObj) {
5749 return;
5750 }
5751
5752 Object *bestObj = NULL;
5753
5754 //First look for a specific object type (object lists will fail)
5755 const ThingTemplate *thingTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( objectType, FALSE );
5756 if( thingTemplate )
5757 {
5758 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES | ALLOW_NEUTRAL, true);
5759 PartitionFilterThing f2(thingTemplate, true);
5760 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f3(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5761 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus filterMapStatus(srcObj);
5762 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5763
5764 Coord3D pos;
5765 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5766
5767 bestObj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5768 if( !bestObj )
5769 {
5770 return;
5771 }
5772 }
5773 else
5774 {
5775 ObjectTypes *objectTypes = TheScriptEngine->getObjectTypes( objectType );
5776 if( objectTypes )
5777 {
5778 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES | ALLOW_NEUTRAL, true);
5779 PartitionFilterValidCommandButtonTarget f3(srcObj, commandButton, true, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5780 PartitionFilterSameMapStatus f4(srcObj);
5781
5782 Coord3D pos;
5783 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5784 Real closestDist;
5785 Real dist;
5786
5787 for( Int typeIndex = 0; typeIndex < objectTypes->getListSize(); typeIndex++ )
5788 {
5789 AsciiString thisTypeName = objectTypes->getNthInList( typeIndex );
5790 const ThingTemplate *thisType = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thisTypeName );
5791 if( thisType )
5792 {
5793 PartitionFilterThing f2( thisType, true );
5794 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &f3, &f4, 0 };
5795
5796 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters, &dist );
5797 if( obj )
5798 {
5799 if( !bestObj || dist < closestDist )
5800 {
5801 bestObj = obj;
5802 closestDist = dist;
5803 }
5804 }
5805 }
5806 }
5807 }
5808 }
5809
5810 // already been checked for validity
5811 theGroup->groupDoCommandButtonAtObject(commandButton, bestObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5812}
5813
5814//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5816//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5817void ScriptActions::doTeamPartialUseCommandButton( Real percentage, const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& commandAbility )
5818{
5819 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5820 if (!team) {
5821 return;
5822 }
5823
5824 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton(commandAbility);
5825 if (!commandButton) {
5826 return;
5827 }
5828
5829 std::vector<Object *> objList;
5830 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList();
5831
5832 for (iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
5833 Object *obj = iter.cur();
5834 if (commandButton->isValidToUseOn(obj, NULL, NULL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT)) {
5835 objList.push_back(obj);
5836 }
5837 }
5838
5839 Int numObjs = /*REAL_TO_INT_CEIL*/(percentage / 100.0f * objList.size());
5840 Int count = 0;
5841 for (std::vector<Object*>::const_iterator it = objList.begin(); it != objList.end(); ++it)
5842 {
5843 Object *obj = (*it);
5844
5845 if (count >= numObjs)
5846 return;
5847
5848 obj->doCommandButton(commandButton, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5849 ++count;
5850 }
5851}
5852
5853//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5855//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5856void ScriptActions::doTeamCaptureNearestUnownedFactionUnit( const AsciiString& teamName )
5857{
5858 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5859 if (!team) {
5860 return;
5861 }
5862
5863 AIGroup *theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5864 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
5865
5866 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation f1(team->getControllingPlayer(), ALLOW_ENEMIES | ALLOW_NEUTRAL, true);
5867 PartitionFilterUnmannedObject f2(true);
5868 PartitionFilterOnMap filterMapStatus;
5869
5870 Coord3D pos;
5871 theGroup->getCenter(&pos);
5872
5873 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
5874 Object *obj = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&pos, REALLY_FAR, FROM_CENTER_2D, filters);
5875 if (!obj) {
5876 return;
5877 }
5878
5879 theGroup->groupEnter(obj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
5880}
5881

5886{
5887 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
5888 if (!team) {
5889 return;
5890 }
5891
5892}

5894//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5895void ScriptActions::doPlayerAddSkillPoints(const AsciiString& playerName, Int delta)
5896{
5897 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
5898 if (!pPlayer)
5899 return;
5900 pPlayer->addSkillPoints(delta);
5901}
5902
5903//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5904void ScriptActions::doPlayerAddRankLevels(const AsciiString& playerName, Int delta)
5905{
5906 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
5907 if (!pPlayer)
5908 return;
5909 pPlayer->setRankLevel(pPlayer->getRankLevel() + delta);
5910}
5911
5912//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5913void ScriptActions::doPlayerSetRankLevel(const AsciiString& playerName, Int level)
5914{

5916 if (!pPlayer)
5917 return;
5918 pPlayer->setRankLevel(level);
5919}

5921//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5922void ScriptActions::doMapSetRankLevelLimit(Int level)
5923{

5925 TheGameLogic->setRankLevelLimit(level);
5926}
5927
5928//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5929void ScriptActions::doPlayerGrantScience(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& scienceName)
5930{
5931 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
5932 if (!pPlayer)
5933 return;
5934 ScienceType science = TheScienceStore->getScienceFromInternalName(scienceName);
5935 if (science == SCIENCE_INVALID)
5936 return;
5937 pPlayer->grantScience(science);
5938}
5939
5940//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5941void ScriptActions::doPlayerPurchaseScience(const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& scienceName)
5942{
5943 Player* pPlayer = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
5944 if (!pPlayer)
5945 return;
5946 ScienceType science = TheScienceStore->getScienceFromInternalName(scienceName);
5947 if (science == SCIENCE_INVALID)
5948 return;
5949 pPlayer->attemptToPurchaseScience(science);
5950}
5951
5952//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5953void ScriptActions::doPlayerSetScienceAvailability( const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& scienceName, const AsciiString& scienceAvailability )
5954{
5955 Player* player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
5956 if( player )
5957 {
5958 ScienceAvailabilityType saType = player->getScienceAvailabilityTypeFromString( scienceAvailability );
5959 if( saType != SCIENCE_AVAILABILITY_INVALID )
5960 {
5961 ScienceType science = TheScienceStore->getScienceFromInternalName( scienceName );
5962 if( science != SCIENCE_INVALID )
5963 {
5964 player->setScienceAvailability( science, saType );
5965 }
5966 }
5967 }
5968}
5969
5970//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5971void ScriptActions::doTeamEmoticon(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& emoticonName, Real duration)
5972{
5973 Team *theTeam = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed( teamName );
5974 if( !theTeam )
5975 {
5976 return;
5977 }
5978
5979 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
5980 if( !theGroup )
5981 {
5982 return;
5983 }
5984 theTeam->getTeamAsAIGroup( theGroup );
5985
5986 Int frames = (Int)( duration * LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND );
5987 theGroup->groupSetEmoticon( emoticonName, frames );
5988}
5989
5990//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5991void ScriptActions::doNamedEmoticon(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& emoticonName, Real duration)
5992{
5993 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
5994 if( obj )
5995 {
5996 Drawable *draw = obj->getDrawable();
5997 if( draw )
5998 {
5999 Int frames = (Int)( duration * LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND );
6000 draw->setEmoticon( emoticonName, frames );
6001 }
6002 }
6003}

6005//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6006// if addObject, we're adding an object to a list. If not addObject, we're removing the associated
6007// object.
6008//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6009void ScriptActions::doObjectTypeListMaintenance(const AsciiString& objectList, const AsciiString& objectType, Bool addObject)
6010{
6011 TheScriptEngine->doObjectTypeListMaintenance( objectList, objectType, addObject );
6012}

6014//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6015void ScriptActions::doRevealMapAtWaypointPermanent(const AsciiString& waypointName, Real radiusToReveal, const AsciiString& playerName, const AsciiString& lookName)
6016{
6017 TheScriptEngine->createNamedMapReveal(lookName, waypointName, radiusToReveal, playerName);
6018 TheScriptEngine->doNamedMapReveal(lookName);
6019}
6020
6021//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6022void ScriptActions::doUndoRevealMapAtWaypointPermanent(const AsciiString& lookName)
6023{
6024 TheScriptEngine->undoNamedMapReveal(lookName);
6025 TheScriptEngine->removeNamedMapReveal(lookName);
6026}
