6028//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6029void ScriptActions::doEvaEnabledDisabled(Bool setEnabled)
6030{
6031 TheEva->setEvaEnabled(setEnabled);
6032}
6033
6034//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6035void ScriptActions::doSetOcclusionMode(Bool setEnabled)
6036{
6037 TheGameLogic->setShowBehindBuildingMarkers(setEnabled);
6038}
6039
6040//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6041void ScriptActions::doSetDrawIconUIMode(Bool setEnabled)
6042{
6043 TheGameLogic->setDrawIconUI(setEnabled);
6044}
6045
6046//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6047void ScriptActions::doSetDynamicLODMode(Bool setEnabled)
6048{
6049 TheGameLogic->setShowDynamicLOD(setEnabled);
6050}
6051
6052//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6053void ScriptActions::doOverrideHulkLifetime( Real seconds )
6054{
6055 if( seconds < 0.0f )
6056 {
6057 // Turn it off.
6058 TheGameLogic->setHulkMaxLifetimeOverride(-1);
6059 }
6060 else
6061 {
6062 // Convert real seconds into frames.
6063 Int frames = (Int)(seconds * LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND);
6064 TheGameLogic->setHulkMaxLifetimeOverride(frames);
6065 }
6066}
6067
6068//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6069// MBL CNC3 INCURSION - This is to Have Max camera animation playback
6070//
6071void ScriptActions::doC3CameraEnableSlaveMode
6072(
6073 const AsciiString& thingTemplateName,
6074 const AsciiString& boneName
6075)
6076{
6077 TheTacticalView->cameraEnableSlaveMode( thingTemplateName, boneName );
6078}
6079
6080//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6081void ScriptActions::doC3CameraDisableSlaveMode( void )
6082{
6083 TheTacticalView->cameraDisableSlaveMode();
6084}
6085
6086//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6087// WST 11.12.2002 CNC3 INCURSION - This is for New Camera Shake
6088//
6089void ScriptActions::doC3CameraShake
6090(
6091 const AsciiString &waypointName,
6092 const Real amplitude,
6093 const Real duration_seconds,
6094 const Real radius
6095)
6096{
6097 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName(waypointName);
6098 DEBUG_ASSERTLOG( (way != NULL), ("Camera shake with No Valid Waypoint\n") );
6099 Coord3D pos = *way->getLocation();
6100
6101 TheTacticalView->Add_Camera_Shake(pos, radius, duration_seconds, amplitude);
6102}
6103
6104//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6105void ScriptActions::doNamedFaceNamed( const AsciiString &unitName, const AsciiString &faceUnitName )
6106{
6107 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
6108 if( obj )
6109 {
6110 Object *faceObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( faceUnitName );
6111 if( faceObj )
6112 {
6113 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAI();
6114 if( ai )
6115 {
6116 ai->clearWaypointQueue();
6117 obj->leaveGroup();
6118 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
6119 ai->aiFaceObject( faceObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
6120 }
6121 }
6122 }
6123}
6124
6125//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6126void ScriptActions::doNamedFaceWaypoint( const AsciiString &unitName, const AsciiString &faceWaypointName )
6127{
6128 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
6129 if( obj )
6130 {
6131 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName( faceWaypointName );
6132 if( way )
6133 {
6134 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAI();
6135 if( ai )
6136 {
6137 ai->clearWaypointQueue();
6138 obj->leaveGroup();
6139 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
6140 ai->aiFacePosition( way->getLocation(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
6141 }
6142 }
6143 }
6144}
6145
6146//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6147void ScriptActions::doTeamFaceNamed( const AsciiString &teamName, const AsciiString &faceUnitName )
6148{
6149 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
6150 if( team )
6151 {
6152 Object *faceObj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( faceUnitName );
6153 if( faceObj )
6154 {
6155 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList();
6156 for( iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
6157 {
6158 Object *obj = iter.cur();
6159 if( obj )
6160 {
6161 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAI();
6162 if( ai )
6163 {
6164 ai->clearWaypointQueue();
6165 obj->leaveGroup();
6166 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
6167 ai->aiFaceObject( faceObj, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
6168 }
6169 }
6170 }
6171 }
6172 }
6173}
6174
6175//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6176void ScriptActions::doTeamFaceWaypoint( const AsciiString &teamName, const AsciiString &faceWaypointName )
6177{
6178 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
6179 if( team )
6180 {
6181 Waypoint *way = TheTerrainLogic->getWaypointByName( faceWaypointName );
6182 if( way )
6183 {
6184 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList();
6185 for( iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance() )
6186 {
6187 Object *obj = iter.cur();
6188 if( obj )
6189 {
6190 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAI();
6191 if( ai )
6192 {
6193 ai->clearWaypointQueue();
6194 obj->leaveGroup();
6195 ai->chooseLocomotorSet( LOCOMOTORSET_NORMAL );
6196 ai->aiFacePosition( way->getLocation(), CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
6197 }
6198 }
6199 }
6200 }
6201 }
6202}
6203
6204//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6205void ScriptActions::doAffectObjectPanelFlagsUnit(const AsciiString& unitName, const AsciiString& flagName, Bool enable)
6206{
6207 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( unitName );
6208 if (!obj) {
6209 return;
6210 }
6211
6212 changeObjectPanelFlagForSingleObject(obj, flagName, enable);
6213}
6214
6215//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6216void ScriptActions::doAffectObjectPanelFlagsTeam(const AsciiString& teamName, const AsciiString& flagName, Bool enable)
6217{
6218 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
6219 if (!team) {
6220 return;
6221 }
6222
6223 DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList();
6224 for (iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
6225 Object *obj = iter.cur();
6226 changeObjectPanelFlagForSingleObject(obj, flagName, enable);
6227 }
6228}
6229
6230//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6231void ScriptActions::doAffectPlayerSkillset(const AsciiString& playerName, Int skillset)
6232{
6233 Player *player = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
6234 if (!player) {
6235 return;
6236 }
6237
6238 --skillset;
6239 player->friend_setSkillset(skillset);
6240}
6241
6242//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6243void ScriptActions::doGuardSupplyCenter(const AsciiString& teamName, Int supplies)
6244{
6245 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
6246 if (!team) {
6247 return;
6248 }
6249 Player *player = team->getControllingPlayer();
6250 if (!player) {
6251 return;
6252 }
6253
6254 player->guardSupplyCenter(team, supplies);
6255}
6256
6257//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6258void ScriptActions::doTeamGuardInTunnelNetwork(const AsciiString& teamName)
6259{
6260 Team *team = TheScriptEngine->getTeamNamed(teamName);
6261 if (!team) {
6262 return;
6263 }
6264 // Have all the members of the team guard at a tunnel network.
6265 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
6266 {
6267 Object *obj = iter.cur();
6268 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
6269 if (!ai) {
6270 continue;
6271 }
6272 ai->aiGuardTunnelNetwork(GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT);
6273 }
6274}
6275
6276//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6277void ScriptActions::doRemoveCommandBarButton(const AsciiString& buttonName, const AsciiString& objectType)
6278{
6279 const ThingTemplate *templ = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(objectType);
6280 if (!templ) {
6281 return;
6282 }
6283 const CommandSet *cs = TheControlBar->findCommandSet(templ->friend_getCommandSetString());
6284 if (!cs) {
6285 return;
6286 }
6287
6288 Int slotNum = -1;
6289 for (Int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; ++i)
6290 {
6291 if (cs->getCommandButton(i) && (cs->getCommandButton(i)->getName() == buttonName))
6292 {
6293 slotNum = i;
6294 break;
6295 }
6296 }
6297
6298 if (slotNum >= 0)
6299 {
6300 TheGameLogic->setControlBarOverride(templ->friend_getCommandSetString(), slotNum, NULL);
6301 }
6302}
6303
6304//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6305void ScriptActions::doAddCommandBarButton(const AsciiString& buttonName, const AsciiString& objectType, Int slotNum)
6306{
6307 const ThingTemplate *templ = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(objectType);
6308 if (!templ) {
6309 return;
6310 }
6311
6312 const CommandButton *commandButton = TheControlBar->findCommandButton( buttonName );
6313 if (commandButton == NULL)
6314 {
6315 // not here. use doRemoveCommandBarButton to remove one.
6316 return;
6317 }
6318
6319 // decrement it, so we can present it as 1-12 for the designers.
6320 --slotNum;
6321
6322 if (slotNum < 0 || slotNum >= MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET)
6323 return;
6324
6325 TheGameLogic->setControlBarOverride(templ->friend_getCommandSetString(), slotNum, commandButton);
6326}
6327
6328//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6329void ScriptActions::doAffectSkillPointsModifier(const AsciiString& playerName, Real newModifier)
6330{
6331 Player *playerDst = TheScriptEngine->getPlayerFromAsciiString(playerName);
6332
6333 if (!playerDst) {
6334 return;
6335 }
6336
6337 playerDst->setSkillPointsModifier(newModifier);
6338
6339}
6340
6341//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6342void ScriptActions::doResizeViewGuardband(const Real gbx, const Real gby)
6343{
6344
6345 Coord2D newGuardBand = { gbx, gby };
6346
6347 TheTacticalView->setGuardBandBias( &newGuardBand );
6348
6349}
6350
6351//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6352void ScriptActions::deleteAllUnmanned()
6353{
6354 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject();
6355 while (obj) {
6356 if (obj->isDisabledByType(DISABLED_UNMANNED))
6357 TheGameLogic->destroyObject(obj);
6358 obj = obj->getNextObject();
6359 }
6360}
6361
6362//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6363void ScriptActions::doEnableOrDisableObjectDifficultyBonuses(Bool enableBonuses)
6364{
6365 // Loops over every object in the game, applying bonuses or not.
6366 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject();
6367 while (obj) {
6368 obj->setReceivingDifficultyBonus(enableBonuses);
6369 obj = obj->getNextObject();
6370 }
6371
6372 // notify the script engine of our decision
6373 TheScriptEngine->setObjectsShouldReceiveDifficultyBonus(enableBonuses);
6374}
6375
6376//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6377void ScriptActions::doChooseVictimAlwaysUsesNormal(Bool enable)
6378{
6379 TheScriptEngine->setChooseVictimAlwaysUsesNormal(enable);
6380}
6381
6382
6383
6384//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6385void ScriptActions::doNamedSetTrainHeld( const AsciiString &locoName, const Bool set )
6386{
6387 Object *obj = TheScriptEngine->getUnitNamed( locoName );
6388 if( obj )
6389 {
6390
6391 static const NameKeyType rrkey = NAMEKEY( "RailroadBehavior" );
6392 RailroadBehavior *rBehavior = (RailroadBehavior*)obj->findUpdateModule( rrkey );
6393
6394 if ( rBehavior )
6395 {
6396 rBehavior->RailroadBehavior::setHeld( set );
6397 }
6398
6399 }
6400}
6401
6402
6403//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6405//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6406void ScriptActions::executeAction( ScriptAction *pAction )
6407{
6408 switch (pAction->getActionType()) {
6409 default:
6410 DEBUG_CRASH(("Unknown ScriptAction type %d", pAction->getActionType())); return;
6411 case ScriptAction::DEBUG_MESSAGE_BOX:
6412 doDebugMessage(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), true);
6413 return;
6414 case ScriptAction::DEBUG_STRING:
6415 doDebugMessage(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), false);
6416 return;
6417 case ScriptAction::DAMAGE_MEMBERS_OF_TEAM:
6418 doDamageTeamMembers(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal());
6419 return;
6420 case ScriptAction::MOVE_TEAM_TO:
6421 doMoveToWaypoint(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6422 return;
6423 case ScriptAction::MOVE_NAMED_UNIT_TO:
6424 doNamedMoveToWaypoint(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6425 return;
6426 case ScriptAction::TEAM_SET_STATE:
6427 doSetTeamState(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6428 return;
6429 case ScriptAction::TEAM_FOLLOW_WAYPOINTS:
6430 doTeamFollowWaypoints(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),
6431 pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(),
6432 pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt());
6433 return;
6434 case ScriptAction::TEAM_FOLLOW_WAYPOINTS_EXACT:
6435 doTeamFollowWaypointsExact(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),
6436 pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(),
6437 pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt());
6438 return;
6439 case ScriptAction::NAMED_FOLLOW_WAYPOINTS_EXACT:
6440 doNamedFollowWaypointsExact(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),
6441 pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6442 return;
6443 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_FOLLOW_APPROACH_PATH:
6444 doTeamFollowSkirmishApproachPath(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),
6445 pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(),
6446 pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt());
6447 return;
6448 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_MOVE_TO_APPROACH_PATH:
6449 doTeamMoveToSkirmishApproachPath(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),
6450 pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6451 return;
6452 case ScriptAction::CREATE_REINFORCEMENT_TEAM:
6453 doCreateReinforcements(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6454 return;
6455 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_BUILD_BUILDING:
6456 doBuildBuilding(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6457 return;
6458 case ScriptAction::AI_PLAYER_BUILD_SUPPLY_CENTER:
6459 doBuildSupplyCenter(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt());
6460 return;
6461 case ScriptAction::AI_PLAYER_BUILD_TYPE_NEAREST_TEAM:
6462 doBuildObjectNearestTeam( pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getString() );
6463 return;
6464 case ScriptAction::AI_PLAYER_BUILD_UPGRADE:
6465 doBuildUpgrade(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6466 return;
6467 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_BUILD_BASE_DEFENSE_FRONT:
6468 doBuildBaseDefense(false);
6469 return;
6470 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_BUILD_BASE_DEFENSE_FLANK:
6471 doBuildBaseDefense(true);
6472 return;
6473 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_BUILD_STRUCTURE_FRONT:
6474 doBuildBaseStructure(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), false);
6475 return;
6476 case ScriptAction::SKIRMISH_BUILD_STRUCTURE_FLANK:
6477 doBuildBaseStructure(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), true);
6478 return;
6479 case ScriptAction::RECRUIT_TEAM:
6480 doRecruitTeam(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal());
6481 return;
6482 case ScriptAction::PLAY_SOUND_EFFECT:
6483 doPlaySoundEffect(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6484 return;
6485 case ScriptAction::MOVE_CAMERA_TO:
6486 doMoveCameraTo(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(4)->getReal());
6487 return;
6488 case ScriptAction::SETUP_CAMERA:
6489 doSetupCamera(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getString());
6490 return;
6491 case ScriptAction::ZOOM_CAMERA:
6492 doZoomCamera(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal());
6493 return;
6494 case ScriptAction::PITCH_CAMERA:
6495 doPitchCamera(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal());
6496 return;
6497 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_FOLLOW_NAMED:
6498 doCameraFollowNamed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), (pAction->getParameter(1) && pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt() != 0));
6499 return;
6500 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_STOP_FOLLOW:
6501 doStopCameraFollowUnit();
6502 return;
6503 case ScriptAction::OVERSIZE_TERRAIN:
6504 doOversizeTheTerrain(pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt());
6505 return;
6506 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_LOOK_TOWARD:
6507 doModCameraLookToward(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6508 return;
6509 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_FINAL_LOOK_TOWARD:
6510 doModCameraFinalLookToward(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6511 return;
6512 case ScriptAction::MOVE_CAMERA_ALONG_WAYPOINT_PATH:
6513 doMoveCameraAlongWaypointPath(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(4)->getReal());
6514 return;
6515 case ScriptAction::ROTATE_CAMERA:
6516 doRotateCamera(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal());
6517 return;
6518 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_LOOK_TOWARD_OBJECT:
6519 doRotateCameraTowardObject(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(4)->getReal());
6520 return;
6521 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_LOOK_TOWARD_WAYPOINT:
6522 doRotateCameraTowardWaypoint(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(4)->getInt());
6523 return;
6524 case ScriptAction::RESET_CAMERA:
6525 doResetCamera(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal());
6526 return;
6527 case ScriptAction::MOVE_CAMERA_TO_SELECTION:
6528 doModCameraMoveToSelection();
6529 return;
6530 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_FREEZE_TIME:
6531 TheTacticalView->cameraModFreezeTime();
6532 return;
6533 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_FREEZE_ANGLE:
6534 TheTacticalView->cameraModFreezeAngle();
6535 return;
6536 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_SET_FINAL_ZOOM:
6537 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalZoom(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal());
6538 return;
6539 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_SET_FINAL_PITCH:
6540 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalPitch(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getReal());
6541 return;
6542 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_SET_FINAL_SPEED_MULTIPLIER:
6543 TheTacticalView->cameraModFinalTimeMultiplier(pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt());
6544 return;
6545 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOD_SET_ROLLING_AVERAGE:
6546 TheTacticalView->cameraModRollingAverage(pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt());
6547 return;
6548 case ScriptAction::SET_VISUAL_SPEED_MULTIPLIER:
6549 TheTacticalView->setTimeMultiplier(pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt());
6550 return;
6551 case ScriptAction::SUSPEND_BACKGROUND_SOUNDS:
6552 TheAudio->pauseAudio(AudioAffect_Sound);
6553 return;
6554 case ScriptAction::RESUME_BACKGROUND_SOUNDS:
6555 TheAudio->resumeAudio(AudioAffect_Sound);
6556 return;
6557 case ScriptAction::PLAY_SOUND_EFFECT_AT:
6558 doPlaySoundEffectAt(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6559 return;
6560 case ScriptAction::SET_INFANTRY_LIGHTING_OVERRIDE:
6561 doSetInfantryLightingOverride(pAction->getParameter(0)->getReal());
6562 return;
6563 case ScriptAction::RESET_INFANTRY_LIGHTING_OVERRIDE:
6564 doSetInfantryLightingOverride(-1.0f);
6565 return;
6566 case ScriptAction::QUICKVICTORY:
6567 doQuickVictory();
6568 return;
6569 case ScriptAction::VICTORY:
6570 doVictory();
6571 return;
6572 case ScriptAction::DEFEAT:
6573 doDefeat();
6574 return;
6575 case ScriptAction::LOCALDEFEAT:
6576 doLocalDefeat();
6577 return;
6578 case ScriptAction::CREATE_OBJECT:
6579 {
6580 Coord3D pos;
6581 pAction->getParameter(2)->getCoord3D(&pos);
6582 doCreateObject( m_unnamedUnit, pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(), &pos, pAction->getParameter(3)->getReal() );
6583 return;
6584 }
6585
6586 case ScriptAction::TEAM_ATTACK_TEAM:
6587 doAttack( pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString() );
6588 return;
6589 case ScriptAction::NAMED_ATTACK_NAMED:
6590 doNamedAttack( pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString() );
6591 return;
6592 case ScriptAction::CREATE_NAMED_ON_TEAM_AT_WAYPOINT:
6593 createUnitOnTeamAt( pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getString());
6594 return;
6595 case ScriptAction::CREATE_UNNAMED_ON_TEAM_AT_WAYPOINT:
6596 createUnitOnTeamAt( AsciiString::TheEmptyString, pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(2)->getString());
6597 return;
6599 case ScriptAction::NAMED_APPLY_ATTACK_PRIORITY_SET:
6600 updateNamedAttackPrioritySet(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6601 return;
6602 case ScriptAction::TEAM_APPLY_ATTACK_PRIORITY_SET:
6603 updateTeamAttackPrioritySet(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6604 return;
6605 case ScriptAction::SET_BASE_CONSTRUCTION_SPEED:
6606 updateBaseConstructionSpeed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6607 return;
6608 case ScriptAction::NAMED_SET_ATTITUDE:
6609 updateNamedSetAttitude(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6610 return;
6611 case ScriptAction::TEAM_SET_ATTITUDE:
6612 updateTeamSetAttitude(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6613 return;
6614 case ScriptAction::NAMED_SET_REPULSOR:
6615 doNamedSetRepulsor(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6616 return;
6617 case ScriptAction::TEAM_SET_REPULSOR:
6618 doTeamSetRepulsor(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6619 return;
6620 case ScriptAction::NAMED_ATTACK_AREA:
6621 doNamedAttackArea(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6622 return;
6623 case ScriptAction::NAMED_ATTACK_TEAM:
6624 doNamedAttackTeam(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6625 return;
6626 case ScriptAction::TEAM_ATTACK_AREA:
6627 doTeamAttackArea(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6628 return;
6629 case ScriptAction::TEAM_ATTACK_NAMED:
6630 doTeamAttackNamed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6631 return;
6632 case ScriptAction::TEAM_LOAD_TRANSPORTS:
6633 doLoadAllTransports(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6634 return;
6635 case ScriptAction::NAMED_ENTER_NAMED:
6636 doNamedEnterNamed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6637 return;
6638 case ScriptAction::TEAM_ENTER_NAMED:
6639 doTeamEnterNamed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6640 return;
6641 case ScriptAction::NAMED_EXIT_ALL:
6642 doNamedExitAll(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6643 return;
6644 case ScriptAction::TEAM_EXIT_ALL:
6645 doTeamExitAll(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6646 return;
6647 case ScriptAction::NAMED_SET_EVAC_LEFT_OR_RIGHT:
6648 doNamedSetGarrisonEvacDisposition(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6649 return;
6650 case ScriptAction::NAMED_FOLLOW_WAYPOINTS:
6651 doNamedFollowWaypoints(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6652 return;
6653 case ScriptAction::NAMED_GUARD:
6654 doNamedGuard(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6655 return;
6656 case ScriptAction::TEAM_GUARD:
6657 doTeamGuard(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6658 return;
6659 case ScriptAction::TEAM_GUARD_POSITION:
6660 doTeamGuardPosition(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6661 return;
6662 case ScriptAction::TEAM_GUARD_OBJECT:
6663 doTeamGuardObject(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6664 return;
6665 case ScriptAction::TEAM_GUARD_AREA:
6666 doTeamGuardArea(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6667 return;
6668 case ScriptAction::NAMED_HUNT:
6669 doNamedHunt(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6670 return;
6671 case ScriptAction::TEAM_HUNT:
6672 doTeamHunt(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6673 return;
6674 case ScriptAction::TEAM_HUNT_WITH_COMMAND_BUTTON:
6675 doTeamHuntWithCommandButton(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6676 return;
6677 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_HUNT:
6678 doPlayerHunt(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6679 return;
6680 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_SELL_EVERYTHING:
6681 doPlayerSellEverything(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6682 return;
6683 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_DISABLE_BASE_CONSTRUCTION:
6684 doPlayerDisableBaseConstruction(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6685 return;
6686 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_DISABLE_FACTORIES:
6687 doPlayerDisableFactories(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6688 return;
6689 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_DISABLE_UNIT_CONSTRUCTION:
6690 doPlayerDisableUnitConstruction(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6691 return;
6692 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_ENABLE_BASE_CONSTRUCTION:
6693 doPlayerEnableBaseConstruction(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6694 return;
6695 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_ENABLE_FACTORIES:
6696 doPlayerEnableFactories(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString() );
6697 return;
6698 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_REPAIR_NAMED_STRUCTURE:
6699 doPlayerRepairStructure(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString() );
6700 return;
6701 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_ENABLE_UNIT_CONSTRUCTION:
6702 doPlayerEnableUnitConstruction(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6703 return;
6704 case ScriptAction::CAMERA_MOVE_HOME:
6705 doCameraMoveHome();
6706 return;
6707 case ScriptAction::BUILD_TEAM:
6708 doBuildTeam(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6709 return;
6710 case ScriptAction::NAMED_DAMAGE:
6711 doNamedDamage(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6712 return;
6713 case ScriptAction::NAMED_DELETE:
6714 doNamedDelete(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6715 return;
6716 case ScriptAction::TEAM_DELETE:
6717 doTeamDelete(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), FALSE);
6718 return;
6719 case ScriptAction::TEAM_DELETE_LIVING:
6720 doTeamDelete(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), TRUE);
6721 return;
6722 case ScriptAction::TEAM_WANDER:
6723 doTeamWander(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6724 return;
6725 case ScriptAction::TEAM_WANDER_IN_PLACE:
6726 doTeamWanderInPlace(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6727 return;
6728 case ScriptAction::TEAM_INCREASE_PRIORITY:
6729 doTeamIncreasePriority(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6730 return;
6731 case ScriptAction::TEAM_DECREASE_PRIORITY:
6732 doTeamDecreasePriority(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6733 return;
6734 case ScriptAction::TEAM_PANIC:
6735 doTeamPanic(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6736 return;
6737 case ScriptAction::NAMED_KILL:
6738 doNamedKill(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6739 return;
6740 case ScriptAction::TEAM_KILL:
6741 doTeamKill(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6742 return;
6743 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_KILL:
6744 doPlayerKill(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6745 return;
6746 case ScriptAction::DISPLAY_TEXT:
6747 doDisplayText(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6748 return;
6749 case ScriptAction::DISPLAY_CINEMATIC_TEXT:
6750 doDisplayCinematicText(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString(),
6751 pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt());
6752 return;
6753 case ScriptAction::DEBUG_CRASH_BOX:
6754#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
6755 {
6756 const char* MSG = "Your Script requested the following message be displayed:\n\n";
6757 const char* MSG2 = "\n\nTHIS IS NOT A BUG. DO NOT REPORT IT.";
6758 DEBUG_CRASH(("%s%s%s\n",MSG,pAction->getParameter(0)->getString().str(),MSG2));
6759 }
6760#endif
6761 return;
6762 case ScriptAction::INGAME_POPUP_MESSAGE:
6763 doInGamePopupMessage(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(),pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt(),
6764 pAction->getParameter(2)->getInt(), pAction->getParameter(3)->getInt(),
6765 pAction->getParameter(4)->getInt() );
6766 return;
6767 case ScriptAction::CAMEO_FLASH:
6768 doCameoFlash(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6769 return;
6770 case ScriptAction::NAMED_FLASH:
6771 doNamedFlash(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt(), NULL);
6772 return;
6773 case ScriptAction::TEAM_FLASH:
6774 doTeamFlash(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt(), NULL);
6775 return;
6776 case ScriptAction::NAMED_FLASH_WHITE:
6777 {
6778 RGBColor c;
6779 c.red = c.green = c.blue = 1.0f;
6780 doNamedFlash(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt(), &c);
6781 }
6782 return;
6783 case ScriptAction::NAMED_CUSTOM_COLOR:
6784 {
6785 doNamedCustomColor(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6786 }
6787 return;
6788 case ScriptAction::TEAM_FLASH_WHITE:
6789 {
6790 RGBColor c;
6791 c.red = c.green = c.blue = 1.0f;
6792 doTeamFlash(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt(), &c);
6793 }
6794 return;
6795 case ScriptAction::MOVIE_PLAY_FULLSCREEN:
6796 doMoviePlayFullScreen(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6797 return;
6798 case ScriptAction::MOVIE_PLAY_RADAR:
6799 doMoviePlayRadar(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6800 return;

6802 doSoundPlayFromNamed(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6803 return;
6804 case ScriptAction::SPEECH_PLAY:
6805 doSpeechPlay(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6806 return;
6807 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP_PLAYER:
6808 doPlayerTransferAssetsToPlayer(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6809 return;
6810 case ScriptAction::NAMED_TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP_PLAYER:
6811 doNamedTransferAssetsToPlayer(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getString());
6812 return;
6813 case ScriptAction::PLAYER_EXCLUDE_FROM_SCORE_SCREEN:
6814 excludePlayerFromScoreScreen(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString());
6815 return;
6816 case ScriptAction::ENABLE_SCORING:
6817 enableScoring(TRUE);
6818 return;
6819 case ScriptAction::DISABLE_SCORING:
6820 enableScoring(FALSE);
6821 return;

6824 return;

6826 {

6829 doRadarCreateEvent(&pos, pAction->getParameter(1)->getInt());
6830 return;
6831 }

6972 TheTacticalView->setViewFilter(FT_VIEW_MOTION_BLUR_FILTER);
6973 return;

6977 return;

6989 return;
6990 case ScriptAction::SET_STOPPING_DISTANCE:
6991 doSetStoppingDistance(pAction->getParameter(0)->getString(), pAction->getParameter(1)->getReal());
6992 return;
6993 case ScriptAction::SET_FPS_LIMIT:
6994 if (!pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt())
6995 {
6996 TheGameEngine->setFramesPerSecondLimit(TheGlobalData->m_framesPerSecondLimit);
6997 }
6998 else
6999 {
7000 TheGameEngine->setFramesPerSecondLimit(pAction->getParameter(0)->getInt());
7001 }
7002 // Setting the fps limit doesn't do much good if we don't use it. jba.
7003 TheWritableGlobalData->m_useFpsLimit = true;
7004 return;

7008 return;
